5147 {
5148 return _attr ? xml_attribute(_attr->next_attribute) : xml_attribute();
5149 }
5150
5151 PUGI__FN xml_attribute xml_attribute::previous_attribute() const
5152 {
5153 return _attr && _attr->prev_attribute_c->next_attribute ? xml_attribute(_attr->prev_attribute_c) : xml_attribute();
5154 }

5157 {

5159 }

5286 {
5287 if (!_attr) return false;
5288
5289 return impl::strcpy_insitu(_attr->name, _attr->header, impl::xml_memory_page_name_allocated_mask, rhs, impl::strlength(rhs));
5290 }

5293 {
5294 if (!_attr) return false;
5295
5296 return impl::strcpy_insitu(_attr->value, _attr->header, impl::xml_memory_page_value_allocated_mask, rhs, impl::strlength(rhs));
5297 }

5304 }

5376 PUGI__FN xml_node::xml_node(): _root(0)
5377 {
5378 }
5379
5380 PUGI__FN xml_node::xml_node(xml_node_struct* p): _root(p)
5381 {
5382 }
5383
5384 PUGI__FN static void unspecified_bool_xml_node(xml_node***)
5385 {
5386 }
5387
5388 PUGI__FN xml_node::operator xml_node::unspecified_bool_type() const
5389 {
5390 return _root ? unspecified_bool_xml_node : 0;
5391 }
5392
5393 PUGI__FN bool xml_node::operator!() const
5394 {
5395 return !_root;
5396 }
5397
5398 PUGI__FN xml_node::iterator xml_node::begin() const
5399 {
5400 return iterator(_root ? _root->first_child + 0 : 0, _root);
5401 }
5402
5403 PUGI__FN xml_node::iterator xml_node::end() const
5404 {
5405 return iterator(0, _root);
5406 }
5407
5408 PUGI__FN xml_node::attribute_iterator xml_node::attributes_begin() const
5409 {
5410 return attribute_iterator(_root ? _root->first_attribute + 0 : 0, _root);
5411 }
5412
5413 PUGI__FN xml_node::attribute_iterator xml_node::attributes_end() const
5414 {
5415 return attribute_iterator(0, _root);
5416 }
5417
5418 PUGI__FN xml_object_range<xml_node_iterator> xml_node::children() const
5419 {
5420 return xml_object_range<xml_node_iterator>(begin(), end());
5421 }
5422
5423 PUGI__FN xml_object_range<xml_named_node_iterator> xml_node::children(const char_t* name_) const
5424 {
5425 return xml_object_range<xml_named_node_iterator>(xml_named_node_iterator(child(name_)._root, _root, name_), xml_named_node_iterator(0, _root, name_));
5426 }
5427
5428 PUGI__FN xml_object_range<xml_attribute_iterator> xml_node::attributes() const
5429 {
5430 return xml_object_range<xml_attribute_iterator>(attributes_begin(), attributes_end());
5431 }
5432
5433 PUGI__FN bool xml_node::operator==(const xml_node& r) const
5434 {
5435 return (_root == r._root);
5436 }
5437
5438 PUGI__FN bool xml_node::operator!=(const xml_node& r) const
5439 {
5440 return (_root != r._root);
5441 }
5442
5443 PUGI__FN bool xml_node::operator<(const xml_node& r) const
5444 {
5445 return (_root < r._root);
5446 }
5447
5448 PUGI__FN bool xml_node::operator>(const xml_node& r) const
5449 {
5450 return (_root > r._root);
5451 }
5452
5453 PUGI__FN bool xml_node::operator<=(const xml_node& r) const
5454 {
5455 return (_root <= r._root);
5456 }
5457
5458 PUGI__FN bool xml_node::operator>=(const xml_node& r) const
5459 {
5460 return (_root >= r._root);
5461 }
5462
5463 PUGI__FN bool xml_node::empty() const
5464 {
5465 return !_root;
5466 }
5467
5468 PUGI__FN const char_t* xml_node::name() const
5469 {
5470 return (_root && _root->name) ? _root->name + 0 : PUGIXML_TEXT("")"";
5471 }
5472
5473 PUGI__FN xml_node_type xml_node::type() const
5474 {
5475 return _root ? PUGI__NODETYPE(_root) : node_null;
5476 }
5477
5478 PUGI__FN const char_t* xml_node::value() const
5479 {
5480 return (_root && _root->value) ? _root->value + 0 : PUGIXML_TEXT("")"";
5481 }
5482
5483 PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::child(const char_t* name_) const
5484 {
5485 if (!_root) return xml_node();
5486
5487 for (xml_node_struct* i = _root->first_child; i; i = i->next_sibling)
5488 if (i->name && impl::strequal(name_, i->name)) return xml_node(i);
5489
5490 return xml_node();
5491 }
5492
5493 PUGI__FN xml_attribute xml_node::attribute(const char_t* name_) const
5494 {
5495 if (!_root) return xml_attribute();
5496
5497 for (xml_attribute_struct* i = _root->first_attribute; i; i = i->next_attribute)
5498 if (i->name && impl::strequal(name_, i->name))
5499 return xml_attribute(i);
5500
5501 return xml_attribute();
5502 }
5503
5504 PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::next_sibling(const char_t* name_) const
5505 {
5506 if (!_root) return xml_node();
5507
5508 for (xml_node_struct* i = _root->next_sibling; i; i = i->next_sibling)
5509 if (i->name && impl::strequal(name_, i->name)) return xml_node(i);
5510
5511 return xml_node();
5512 }
5513
5514 PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::next_sibling() const
5515 {
5516 return _root ? xml_node(_root->next_sibling) : xml_node();
5517 }
5518
5519 PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::previous_sibling(const char_t* name_) const
5520 {
5521 if (!_root) return xml_node();
5522
5523 for (xml_node_struct* i = _root->prev_sibling_c; i->next_sibling; i = i->prev_sibling_c)
5524 if (i->name && impl::strequal(name_, i->name)) return xml_node(i);
5525
5526 return xml_node();
5527 }
5528
5529 PUGI__FN xml_attribute xml_node::attribute(const char_t* name_, xml_attribute& hint_) const
5530 {
5531 xml_attribute_struct* hint = hint_._attr;
5532
5533 // if hint is not an attribute of node, behavior is not defined
5534 assert(!hint || (_root && impl::is_attribute_of(hint, _root)))(static_cast <bool> (!hint || (_root && impl::is_attribute_of
(hint, _root))) ? void (0) : __assert_fail ("!hint || (_root && impl::is_attribute_of(hint, _root))"
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 5534, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
5535
5536 if (!_root) return xml_attribute();
5537
5538 // optimistically search from hint up until the end
5539 for (xml_attribute_struct* i = hint; i; i = i->next_attribute)
5540 if (i->name && impl::strequal(name_, i->name))
5541 {
5542 // update hint to maximize efficiency of searching for consecutive attributes
5543 hint_._attr = i->next_attribute;
5544
5545 return xml_attribute(i);
5546 }
5547
5548 // wrap around and search from the first attribute until the hint
5549 // 'j' null pointer check is technically redundant, but it prevents a crash in case the assertion above fails
5550 for (xml_attribute_struct* j = _root->first_attribute; j && j != hint; j = j->next_attribute)
5551 if (j->name && impl::strequal(name_, j->name))
5552 {
5553 // update hint to maximize efficiency of searching for consecutive attributes
5554 hint_._attr = j->next_attribute;
5555
5556 return xml_attribute(j);
5557 }
5558
5559 return xml_attribute();
5560 }
5561
5562 PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::previous_sibling() const
5563 {
5564 if (!_root) return xml_node();
5565
5566 if (_root->prev_sibling_c->next_sibling) return xml_node(_root->prev_sibling_c);
5567 else return xml_node();
5568 }
5569
5570 PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::parent() const
5571 {
5572 return _root ? xml_node(_root->parent) : xml_node();
5573 }
5574
5575 PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::root() const
5576 {
5577 return _root ? xml_node(&impl::get_document(_root)) : xml_node();
5578 }
5579
5580 PUGI__FN xml_text xml_node::text() const
5581 {
5582 return xml_text(_root);
5583 }
5584
5585 PUGI__FN const char_t* xml_node::child_value() const
5586 {
5587 if (!_root) return PUGIXML_TEXT("")"";
5588
5589 // element nodes can have value if parse_embed_pcdata was used
5590 if (PUGI__NODETYPE(_root) == node_element && _root->value)
5591 return _root->value;
5592
5593 for (xml_node_struct* i = _root->first_child; i; i = i->next_sibling)
5594 if (impl::is_text_node(i) && i->value)
5595 return i->value;
5596
5597 return PUGIXML_TEXT("")"";
5598 }
5599
5600 PUGI__FN const char_t* xml_node::child_value(const char_t* name_) const
5601 {
5602 return child(name_).child_value();
5603 }
5604
5605 PUGI__FN xml_attribute xml_node::first_attribute() const
5606 {
5607 return _root ? xml_attribute(_root->first_attribute) : xml_attribute();
5608 }
5609
5610 PUGI__FN xml_attribute xml_node::last_attribute() const
5611 {
5612 return _root && _root->first_attribute ? xml_attribute(_root->first_attribute->prev_attribute_c) : xml_attribute();
5613 }
5614
5615 PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::first_child() const
5616 {
5617 return _root ? xml_node(_root->first_child) : xml_node();
5618 }
5619
5620 PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::last_child() const
5621 {
5622 return _root && _root->first_child ? xml_node(_root->first_child->prev_sibling_c) : xml_node();
5623 }
5624
5625 PUGI__FN bool xml_node::set_name(const char_t* rhs)
5626 {
5627 xml_node_type type_ = _root ? PUGI__NODETYPE(_root) : node_null;
5628
5629 if (type_ != node_element && type_ != node_pi && type_ != node_declaration)
5630 return false;
5631
5632 return impl::strcpy_insitu(_root->name, _root->header, impl::xml_memory_page_name_allocated_mask, rhs, impl::strlength(rhs));
5633 }
5634
5635 PUGI__FN bool xml_node::set_value(const char_t* rhs)
5636 {
5637 xml_node_type type_ = _root ? PUGI__NODETYPE(_root) : node_null;
5638
5639 if (type_ != node_pcdata && type_ != node_cdata && type_ != node_comment && type_ != node_pi && type_ != node_doctype)
5640 return false;
5641
5642 return impl::strcpy_insitu(_root->value, _root->header, impl::xml_memory_page_value_allocated_mask, rhs, impl::strlength(rhs));
5643 }
5644
5645 PUGI__FN xml_attribute xml_node::append_attribute(const char_t* name_)
5646 {
5647 if (!impl::allow_insert_attribute(type())) return xml_attribute();
5648
5649 impl::xml_allocator& alloc = impl::get_allocator(_root);
5650 if (!alloc.reserve()) return xml_attribute();
5651
5652 xml_attribute a(impl::allocate_attribute(alloc));
5653 if (!a) return xml_attribute();
5654
5655 impl::append_attribute(a._attr, _root);
5656
5657 a.set_name(name_);
5658
5659 return a;
5660 }
5661
5662 PUGI__FN xml_attribute xml_node::prepend_attribute(const char_t* name_)
5663 {
5664 if (!impl::allow_insert_attribute(type())) return xml_attribute();
5665
5666 impl::xml_allocator& alloc = impl::get_allocator(_root);
5667 if (!alloc.reserve()) return xml_attribute();
5668
5669 xml_attribute a(impl::allocate_attribute(alloc));
5670 if (!a) return xml_attribute();
5671
5672 impl::prepend_attribute(a._attr, _root);
5673
5674 a.set_name(name_);
5675
5676 return a;
5677 }
5678
5679 PUGI__FN xml_attribute xml_node::insert_attribute_after(const char_t* name_, const xml_attribute& attr)
5680 {
5681 if (!impl::allow_insert_attribute(type())) return xml_attribute();
5682 if (!attr || !impl::is_attribute_of(attr._attr, _root)) return xml_attribute();
5683
5684 impl::xml_allocator& alloc = impl::get_allocator(_root);
5685 if (!alloc.reserve()) return xml_attribute();
5686
5687 xml_attribute a(impl::allocate_attribute(alloc));
5688 if (!a) return xml_attribute();
5689
5690 impl::insert_attribute_after(a._attr, attr._attr, _root);
5691
5692 a.set_name(name_);
5693
5694 return a;
5695 }
5696
5697 PUGI__FN xml_attribute xml_node::insert_attribute_before(const char_t* name_, const xml_attribute& attr)
5698 {
5699 if (!impl::allow_insert_attribute(type())) return xml_attribute();
5700 if (!attr || !impl::is_attribute_of(attr._attr, _root)) return xml_attribute();
5701
5702 impl::xml_allocator& alloc = impl::get_allocator(_root);
5703 if (!alloc.reserve()) return xml_attribute();
5704
5705 xml_attribute a(impl::allocate_attribute(alloc));
5706 if (!a) return xml_attribute();
5707
5708 impl::insert_attribute_before(a._attr, attr._attr, _root);
5709
5710 a.set_name(name_);
5711
5712 return a;
5713 }

5716 {

5718 if (!impl::allow_insert_attribute(type())) return xml_attribute();

5720 impl::xml_allocator& alloc = impl::get_allocator(_root);
5721 if (!alloc.reserve()) return xml_attribute();
5722
5723 xml_attribute a(impl::allocate_attribute(alloc));
5724 if (!a) return xml_attribute();
5725
5726 impl::append_attribute(a._attr, _root);
5727 impl::node_copy_attribute(a._attr, proto._attr);
5728
5729 return a;
5730 }

5768 {

5771 if (!attr || !impl::is_attribute_of(attr._attr, _root)) return xml_attribute();

5784
5785 PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::append_child(xml_node_type type_)
5786 {
5787 if (!impl::allow_insert_child(type(), type_)) return xml_node();
5788
5789 impl::xml_allocator& alloc = impl::get_allocator(_root);
5790 if (!alloc.reserve()) return xml_node();
5791
5792 xml_node n(impl::allocate_node(alloc, type_));
5793 if (!n) return xml_node();
5794
5795 impl::append_node(n._root, _root);
5796
5797 if (type_ == node_declaration) n.set_name(PUGIXML_TEXT("xml")"xml");
5798
5799 return n;
5800 }
5801
5802 PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::prepend_child(xml_node_type type_)
5803 {
5804 if (!impl::allow_insert_child(type(), type_)) return xml_node();
5805
5806 impl::xml_allocator& alloc = impl::get_allocator(_root);
5807 if (!alloc.reserve()) return xml_node();
5808
5809 xml_node n(impl::allocate_node(alloc, type_));
5810 if (!n) return xml_node();
5811
5812 impl::prepend_node(n._root, _root);
5813
5814 if (type_ == node_declaration) n.set_name(PUGIXML_TEXT("xml")"xml");
5815
5816 return n;
5817 }
5818
5819 PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::insert_child_before(xml_node_type type_, const xml_node& node)
5820 {
5821 if (!impl::allow_insert_child(type(), type_)) return xml_node();
5822 if (!node._root || node._root->parent != _root) return xml_node();
5823
5824 impl::xml_allocator& alloc = impl::get_allocator(_root);
5825 if (!alloc.reserve()) return xml_node();
5826
5827 xml_node n(impl::allocate_node(alloc, type_));
5828 if (!n) return xml_node();
5829
5830 impl::insert_node_before(n._root, node._root);
5831
5832 if (type_ == node_declaration) n.set_name(PUGIXML_TEXT("xml")"xml");
5833
5834 return n;
5835 }
5836
5837 PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::insert_child_after(xml_node_type type_, const xml_node& node)
5838 {
5839 if (!impl::allow_insert_child(type(), type_)) return xml_node();
5840 if (!node._root || node._root->parent != _root) return xml_node();
5841
5842 impl::xml_allocator& alloc = impl::get_allocator(_root);
5843 if (!alloc.reserve()) return xml_node();
5844
5845 xml_node n(impl::allocate_node(alloc, type_));
5846 if (!n) return xml_node();
5847
5848 impl::insert_node_after(n._root, node._root);
5849
5850 if (type_ == node_declaration) n.set_name(PUGIXML_TEXT("xml")"xml");
5851
5852 return n;
5853 }
5854
5855 PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::append_child(const char_t* name_)
5856 {
5857 xml_node result = append_child(node_element);
5858
5859 result.set_name(name_);
5860
5861 return result;
5862 }

5865 {
5866 xml_node result = prepend_child(node_element);
5867
5868 result.set_name(name_);
5869
5870 return result;
5871 }

5874 {
5875 xml_node result = insert_child_after(node_element, node);

5878
5879 return result;
5880 }

5883 {
5884 xml_node result = insert_child_before(node_element, node);
5885
5886 result.set_name(name_);
5887
5888 return result;
5889 }
5890
5891 PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::append_copy(const xml_node& proto)
5892 {
5893 xml_node_type type_ = proto.type();
5894 if (!impl::allow_insert_child(type(), type_)) return xml_node();
5895
5896 impl::xml_allocator& alloc = impl::get_allocator(_root);
5897 if (!alloc.reserve()) return xml_node();
5898
5899 xml_node n(impl::allocate_node(alloc, type_));
5900 if (!n) return xml_node();
5901
5902 impl::append_node(n._root, _root);
5903 impl::node_copy_tree(n._root, proto._root);
5904
5905 return n;
5906 }
5907
5908 PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::prepend_copy(const xml_node& proto)
5909 {
5910 xml_node_type type_ = proto.type();
5911 if (!impl::allow_insert_child(type(), type_)) return xml_node();
5912
5913 impl::xml_allocator& alloc = impl::get_allocator(_root);
5914 if (!alloc.reserve()) return xml_node();
5915
5916 xml_node n(impl::allocate_node(alloc, type_));
5917 if (!n) return xml_node();
5918
5919 impl::prepend_node(n._root, _root);
5920 impl::node_copy_tree(n._root, proto._root);
5921
5922 return n;
5923 }
5924
5925 PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::insert_copy_after(const xml_node& proto, const xml_node& node)
5926 {
5927 xml_node_type type_ = proto.type();
5928 if (!impl::allow_insert_child(type(), type_)) return xml_node();
5929 if (!node._root || node._root->parent != _root) return xml_node();
5930
5931 impl::xml_allocator& alloc = impl::get_allocator(_root);
5932 if (!alloc.reserve()) return xml_node();
5933
5934 xml_node n(impl::allocate_node(alloc, type_));
5935 if (!n) return xml_node();
5936
5937 impl::insert_node_after(n._root, node._root);
5938 impl::node_copy_tree(n._root, proto._root);
5939
5940 return n;
5941 }
5942
5943 PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::insert_copy_before(const xml_node& proto, const xml_node& node)
5944 {
5945 xml_node_type type_ = proto.type();
5946 if (!impl::allow_insert_child(type(), type_)) return xml_node();
5947 if (!node._root || node._root->parent != _root) return xml_node();
5948
5949 impl::xml_allocator& alloc = impl::get_allocator(_root);
5950 if (!alloc.reserve()) return xml_node();
5951
5952 xml_node n(impl::allocate_node(alloc, type_));
5953 if (!n) return xml_node();
5954
5955 impl::insert_node_before(n._root, node._root);
5956 impl::node_copy_tree(n._root, proto._root);
5957
5958 return n;
5959 }
5960
5961 PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::append_move(const xml_node& moved)
5962 {
5963 if (!impl::allow_move(*this, moved)) return xml_node();
5964
5965 impl::xml_allocator& alloc = impl::get_allocator(_root);
5966 if (!alloc.reserve()) return xml_node();
5967
5968 // disable document_buffer_order optimization since moving nodes around changes document order without changing buffer pointers
5969 impl::get_document(_root).header |= impl::xml_memory_page_contents_shared_mask;
5970
5971 impl::remove_node(moved._root);
5972 impl::append_node(moved._root, _root);
5973
5974 return moved;
5975 }
5976
5977 PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::prepend_move(const xml_node& moved)
5978 {
5979 if (!impl::allow_move(*this, moved)) return xml_node();
5980
5981 impl::xml_allocator& alloc = impl::get_allocator(_root);
5982 if (!alloc.reserve()) return xml_node();
5983
5984 // disable document_buffer_order optimization since moving nodes around changes document order without changing buffer pointers
5985 impl::get_document(_root).header |= impl::xml_memory_page_contents_shared_mask;
5986
5987 impl::remove_node(moved._root);
5988 impl::prepend_node(moved._root, _root);
5989
5990 return moved;
5991 }
5992
5993 PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::insert_move_after(const xml_node& moved, const xml_node& node)
5994 {
5995 if (!impl::allow_move(*this, moved)) return xml_node();
5996 if (!node._root || node._root->parent != _root) return xml_node();
5997 if (moved._root == node._root) return xml_node();
5998
5999 impl::xml_allocator& alloc = impl::get_allocator(_root);
6000 if (!alloc.reserve()) return xml_node();
6001
6002 // disable document_buffer_order optimization since moving nodes around changes document order without changing buffer pointers
6003 impl::get_document(_root).header |= impl::xml_memory_page_contents_shared_mask;
6004
6005 impl::remove_node(moved._root);
6006 impl::insert_node_after(moved._root, node._root);
6007
6008 return moved;
6009 }
6010
6011 PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::insert_move_before(const xml_node& moved, const xml_node& node)
6012 {
6013 if (!impl::allow_move(*this, moved)) return xml_node();
6014 if (!node._root || node._root->parent != _root) return xml_node();
6015 if (moved._root == node._root) return xml_node();
6016
6017 impl::xml_allocator& alloc = impl::get_allocator(_root);
6018 if (!alloc.reserve()) return xml_node();
6019
6020 // disable document_buffer_order optimization since moving nodes around changes document order without changing buffer pointers
6021 impl::get_document(_root).header |= impl::xml_memory_page_contents_shared_mask;
6022
6023 impl::remove_node(moved._root);
6024 impl::insert_node_before(moved._root, node._root);
6025
6026 return moved;
6027 }
6028
6029 PUGI__FN bool xml_node::remove_attribute(const char_t* name_)
6030 {
6031 return remove_attribute(attribute(name_));
6032 }
6033
6034 PUGI__FN bool xml_node::remove_attribute(const xml_attribute& a)
6035 {
6036 if (!_root || !a._attr) return false;
6037 if (!impl::is_attribute_of(a._attr, _root)) return false;
6038
6039 impl::xml_allocator& alloc = impl::get_allocator(_root);
6040 if (!alloc.reserve()) return false;
6041
6042 impl::remove_attribute(a._attr, _root);
6043 impl::destroy_attribute(a._attr, alloc);
6044
6045 return true;
6046 }
6047
6048 PUGI__FN bool xml_node::remove_child(const char_t* name_)
6049 {
6050 return remove_child(child(name_));
6051 }
6052
6053 PUGI__FN bool xml_node::remove_child(const xml_node& n)
6054 {
6055 if (!_root || !n._root || n._root->parent != _root) return false;
6056
6057 impl::xml_allocator& alloc = impl::get_allocator(_root);
6058 if (!alloc.reserve()) return false;
6059
6060 impl::remove_node(n._root);
6061 impl::destroy_node(n._root, alloc);
6062
6063 return true;
6064 }
6065
6066 PUGI__FN xml_parse_result xml_node::append_buffer(const void* contents, size_t size, unsigned int options, xml_encoding encoding)
6067 {
6068 // append_buffer is only valid for elements/documents
6069 if (!impl::allow_insert_child(type(), node_element)) return impl::make_parse_result(status_append_invalid_root);
6070
6071 // get document node
6072 impl::xml_document_struct* doc = &impl::get_document(_root);
6073
6074 // disable document_buffer_order optimization since in a document with multiple buffers comparing buffer pointers does not make sense
6075 doc->header |= impl::xml_memory_page_contents_shared_mask;
6076
6077 // get extra buffer element (we'll store the document fragment buffer there so that we can deallocate it later)
6078 impl::xml_memory_page* page = 0;
6079 impl::xml_extra_buffer* extra = static_cast<impl::xml_extra_buffer*>(doc->allocate_memory(sizeof(impl::xml_extra_buffer) + sizeof(void*), page));
6080 (void)page;
6081
6082 if (!extra) return impl::make_parse_result(status_out_of_memory);
6083
6084 #ifdef PUGIXML_COMPACT
6085 // align the memory block to a pointer boundary; this is required for compact mode where memory allocations are only 4b aligned
6086 // note that this requires up to sizeof(void*)-1 additional memory, which the allocation above takes into account
6087 extra = reinterpret_cast<impl::xml_extra_buffer*>((reinterpret_cast<uintptr_t>(extra) + (sizeof(void*) - 1)) & ~(sizeof(void*) - 1));
6088 #endif
6089
6090 // add extra buffer to the list
6091 extra->buffer = 0;
6092 extra->next = doc->extra_buffers;
6093 doc->extra_buffers = extra;
6094
6095 // name of the root has to be NULL before parsing - otherwise closing node mismatches will not be detected at the top level
6096 impl::name_null_sentry sentry(_root);
6097
6098 return impl::load_buffer_impl(doc, _root, const_cast<void*>(contents), size, options, encoding, false, false, &extra->buffer);
6099 }
6100
6101 PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::find_child_by_attribute(const char_t* name_, const char_t* attr_name, const char_t* attr_value) const
6102 {
6103 if (!_root) return xml_node();
6104
6105 for (xml_node_struct* i = _root->first_child; i; i = i->next_sibling)
6106 if (i->name && impl::strequal(name_, i->name))
6107 {
6108 for (xml_attribute_struct* a = i->first_attribute; a; a = a->next_attribute)
6109 if (a->name && impl::strequal(attr_name, a->name) && impl::strequal(attr_value, a->value ? a->value + 0 : PUGIXML_TEXT("")""))
6110 return xml_node(i);
6111 }
6112
6113 return xml_node();
6114 }
6115
6116 PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::find_child_by_attribute(const char_t* attr_name, const char_t* attr_value) const
6117 {
6118 if (!_root) return xml_node();
6119
6120 for (xml_node_struct* i = _root->first_child; i; i = i->next_sibling)
6121 for (xml_attribute_struct* a = i->first_attribute; a; a = a->next_attribute)
6122 if (a->name && impl::strequal(attr_name, a->name) && impl::strequal(attr_value, a->value ? a->value + 0 : PUGIXML_TEXT("")""))
6123 return xml_node(i);
6124
6125 return xml_node();
6126 }
6127
6128#ifndef PUGIXML_NO_STL
6129 PUGI__FN string_t xml_node::path(char_t delimiter) const
6130 {
6131 if (!_root) return string_t();
6132
6133 size_t offset = 0;
6134
6135 for (xml_node_struct* i = _root; i; i = i->parent)
6136 {
6137 offset += (i != _root);
6138 offset += i->name ? impl::strlength(i->name) : 0;
6139 }
6140
6141 string_t result;
6142 result.resize(offset);
6143
6144 for (xml_node_struct* j = _root; j; j = j->parent)
6145 {
6146 if (j != _root)
6147 result[--offset] = delimiter;
6148
6149 if (j->name)
6150 {
6151 size_t length = impl::strlength(j->name);
6152
6153 offset -= length;
6154 memcpy(&result[offset], j->name, length * sizeof(char_t));
6155 }
6156 }
6157
6158 assert(offset == 0)(static_cast <bool> (offset == 0) ? void (0) : __assert_fail
("offset == 0", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 6158, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
6159
6160 return result;
6161 }
6162#endif
6163
6164 PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::first_element_by_path(const char_t* path_, char_t delimiter) const
6165 {
6166 xml_node found = *this; // Current search context.
6167
6168 if (!_root || !path_[0]) return found;
6169
6170 if (path_[0] == delimiter)
6171 {
6172 // Absolute path; e.g. '/foo/bar'
6173 found = found.root();
6174 ++path_;
6175 }
6176
6177 const char_t* path_segment = path_;
6178
6179 while (*path_segment == delimiter) ++path_segment;
6180
6181 const char_t* path_segment_end = path_segment;
6182
6183 while (*path_segment_end && *path_segment_end != delimiter) ++path_segment_end;
6184
6185 if (path_segment == path_segment_end) return found;
6186
6187 const char_t* next_segment = path_segment_end;
6188
6189 while (*next_segment == delimiter) ++next_segment;
6190
6191 if (*path_segment == '.' && path_segment + 1 == path_segment_end)
6192 return found.first_element_by_path(next_segment, delimiter);
6193 else if (*path_segment == '.' && *(path_segment+1) == '.' && path_segment + 2 == path_segment_end)
6194 return found.parent().first_element_by_path(next_segment, delimiter);
6195 else
6196 {
6197 for (xml_node_struct* j = found._root->first_child; j; j = j->next_sibling)
6198 {
6199 if (j->name && impl::strequalrange(j->name, path_segment, static_cast<size_t>(path_segment_end - path_segment)))
6200 {
6201 xml_node subsearch = xml_node(j).first_element_by_path(next_segment, delimiter);
6202
6203 if (subsearch) return subsearch;
6204 }
6205 }
6206
6207 return xml_node();
6208 }
6209 }
6210
6211 PUGI__FN bool xml_node::traverse(xml_tree_walker& walker)
6212 {
6213 walker._depth = -1;
6214
6215 xml_node arg_begin(_root);
6216 if (!walker.begin(arg_begin)) return false;
6217
6218 xml_node_struct* cur = _root ? _root->first_child + 0 : 0;
6219
6220 if (cur)
6221 {
6222 ++walker._depth;
6223
6224 do
6225 {
6226 xml_node arg_for_each(cur);
6227 if (!walker.for_each(arg_for_each))
6228 return false;
6229
6230 if (cur->first_child)
6231 {
6232 ++walker._depth;
6233 cur = cur->first_child;
6234 }
6235 else if (cur->next_sibling)
6236 cur = cur->next_sibling;
6237 else
6238 {
6239 while (!cur->next_sibling && cur != _root && cur->parent)
6240 {
6241 --walker._depth;
6242 cur = cur->parent;
6243 }
6244
6245 if (cur != _root)
6246 cur = cur->next_sibling;
6247 }
6248 }
6249 while (cur && cur != _root);
6250 }
6251
6252 assert(walker._depth == -1)(static_cast <bool> (walker._depth == -1) ? void (0) : __assert_fail
("walker._depth == -1", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 6252, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
6253
6254 xml_node arg_end(_root);
6255 return walker.end(arg_end);
6256 }
6257
6258 PUGI__FN size_t xml_node::hash_value() const
6259 {
6260 return static_cast<size_t>(reinterpret_cast<uintptr_t>(_root) / sizeof(xml_node_struct));
6261 }
6262
6263 PUGI__FN xml_node_struct* xml_node::internal_object() const
6264 {
6265 return _root;
6266 }
6267
6268 PUGI__FN void xml_node::print(xml_writer& writer, const char_t* indent, unsigned int flags, xml_encoding encoding, unsigned int depth) const
6269 {
6270 if (!_root) return;
6271
6272 impl::xml_buffered_writer buffered_writer(writer, encoding);
6273
6274 impl::node_output(buffered_writer, _root, indent, flags, depth);
6275
6276 buffered_writer.flush();
6277 }
6278
6279#ifndef PUGIXML_NO_STL
6280 PUGI__FN void xml_node::print(std::basic_ostream<char, std::char_traits<char> >& stream, const char_t* indent, unsigned int flags, xml_encoding encoding, unsigned int depth) const
6281 {
6282 xml_writer_stream writer(stream);
6283
6284 print(writer, indent, flags, encoding, depth);
6285 }
6286
6287 PUGI__FN void xml_node::print(std::basic_ostream<wchar_t, std::char_traits<wchar_t> >& stream, const char_t* indent, unsigned int flags, unsigned int depth) const
6288 {
6289 xml_writer_stream writer(stream);
6290
6291 print(writer, indent, flags, encoding_wchar, depth);
6292 }
6293#endif
6294
6295 PUGI__FN ptrdiff_t xml_node::offset_debug() const
6296 {
6297 if (!_root) return -1;
6298
6299 impl::xml_document_struct& doc = impl::get_document(_root);
6300
6301 // we can determine the offset reliably only if there is exactly once parse buffer
6302 if (!doc.buffer || doc.extra_buffers) return -1;
6303
6304 switch (type())
6305 {
6306 case node_document:
6307 return 0;
6308
6309 case node_element:
6310 case node_declaration:
6311 case node_pi:
6312 return _root->name && (_root->header & impl::xml_memory_page_name_allocated_or_shared_mask) == 0 ? _root->name - doc.buffer : -1;
6313
6314 case node_pcdata:
6315 case node_cdata:
6316 case node_comment:
6317 case node_doctype:
6318 return _root->value && (_root->header & impl::xml_memory_page_value_allocated_or_shared_mask) == 0 ? _root->value - doc.buffer : -1;
6319
6320 default:
6321 assert(false && "Invalid node type")(static_cast <bool> (false && "Invalid node type"
) ? void (0) : __assert_fail ("false && \"Invalid node type\""
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 6321, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__)); // unreachable
6322 return -1;
6323 }
6324 }
6325
6326#ifdef __BORLANDC__
6327 PUGI__FN bool operator&&(const xml_node& lhs, bool rhs)
6328 {
6329 return (bool)lhs && rhs;
6330 }
6331
6332 PUGI__FN bool operator||(const xml_node& lhs, bool rhs)
6333 {
6334 return (bool)lhs || rhs;
6335 }
6336#endif
6337
6338 PUGI__FN xml_text::xml_text(xml_node_struct* root): _root(root)
6339 {
6340 }
6341
6342 PUGI__FN xml_node_struct* xml_text::_data() const
6343 {
6344 if (!_root || impl::is_text_node(_root)) return _root;
6345
6346 // element nodes can have value if parse_embed_pcdata was used
6347 if (PUGI__NODETYPE(_root) == node_element && _root->value)
6348 return _root;
6349
6350 for (xml_node_struct* node = _root->first_child; node; node = node->next_sibling)
6351 if (impl::is_text_node(node))
6352 return node;
6353
6354 return 0;
6355 }
6356
6357 PUGI__FN xml_node_struct* xml_text::_data_new()
6358 {
6359 xml_node_struct* d = _data();
6360 if (d) return d;
6361
6362 return xml_node(_root).append_child(node_pcdata).internal_object();
6363 }
6364
6365 PUGI__FN xml_text::xml_text(): _root(0)
6366 {
6367 }

6370 {
6371 }

6373 PUGI__FN xml_text::operator xml_text::unspecified_bool_type() const
6374 {
6375 return _data() ? unspecified_bool_xml_text : 0;
6376 }
6377
6378 PUGI__FN bool xml_text::operator!() const
6379 {
6380 return !_data();
6381 }
6382
6383 PUGI__FN bool xml_text::empty() const
6384 {
6385 return _data() == 0;
6386 }

6388 PUGI__FN const char_t* xml_text::get() const
6389 {
6390 xml_node_struct* d = _data();
6391
6392 return (d && d->value) ? d->value + 0 : PUGIXML_TEXT("")"";
6393 }

6399 return (d && d->value) ? d->value + 0 : def;

6454 {

6456
6457 return dn ? impl::strcpy_insitu(dn->value, dn->header, impl::xml_memory_page_value_allocated_mask, rhs, impl::strlength(rhs)) : false;
6458 }

6465 }

6653 {

6744 {

6748 PUGI__FN xml_node& xml_named_node_iterator::operator*() const
6749 {
6750 assert(_wrap._root)(static_cast <bool> (_wrap._root) ? void (0) : __assert_fail
("_wrap._root", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 6750, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));

6755 {
6756 assert(_wrap._root)(static_cast <bool> (_wrap._root) ? void (0) : __assert_fail
("_wrap._root", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 6756, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
6757 return const_cast<xml_node*>(&_wrap); // BCC5 workaround

6759
6760 PUGI__FN const xml_named_node_iterator& xml_named_node_iterator::operator++()
6761 {
6762 assert(_wrap._root)(static_cast <bool> (_wrap._root) ? void (0) : __assert_fail
("_wrap._root", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 6762, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
6763 _wrap = _wrap.next_sibling(_name);
6764 return *this;
6765 }
6766
6767 PUGI__FN xml_named_node_iterator xml_named_node_iterator::operator++(int)
6768 {
6769 xml_named_node_iterator temp = *this;
6770 ++*this;
6771 return temp;
6772 }
6773
6774 PUGI__FN const xml_named_node_iterator& xml_named_node_iterator::operator--()
6775 {
6776 if (_wrap._root)
6777 _wrap = _wrap.previous_sibling(_name);
6778 else
6779 {
6780 _wrap = _parent.last_child();
6781
6782 if (!impl::strequal(_wrap.name(), _name))
6783 _wrap = _wrap.previous_sibling(_name);
6784 }
6785
6786 return *this;
6787 }
6788
6789 PUGI__FN xml_named_node_iterator xml_named_node_iterator::operator--(int)
6790 {
6791 xml_named_node_iterator temp = *this;
6792 --*this;
6793 return temp;
6794 }
6795
6796 PUGI__FN xml_parse_result::xml_parse_result(): status(status_internal_error), offset(0), encoding(encoding_auto)
6797 {
6798 }
6799
6800 PUGI__FN xml_parse_result::operator bool() const
6801 {
6802 return status == status_ok;
6803 }
6804
6805 PUGI__FN const char* xml_parse_result::description() const
6806 {
6807 switch (status)
6808 {
6809 case status_ok: return "No error";
6810
6811 case status_file_not_found: return "File was not found";
6812 case status_io_error: return "Error reading from file/stream";
6813 case status_out_of_memory: return "Could not allocate memory";
6814 case status_internal_error: return "Internal error occurred";
6815
6816 case status_unrecognized_tag: return "Could not determine tag type";
6817
6818 case status_bad_pi: return "Error parsing document declaration/processing instruction";
6819 case status_bad_comment: return "Error parsing comment";
6820 case status_bad_cdata: return "Error parsing CDATA section";
6821 case status_bad_doctype: return "Error parsing document type declaration";
6822 case status_bad_pcdata: return "Error parsing PCDATA section";
6823 case status_bad_start_element: return "Error parsing start element tag";
6824 case status_bad_attribute: return "Error parsing element attribute";
6825 case status_bad_end_element: return "Error parsing end element tag";
6826 case status_end_element_mismatch: return "Start-end tags mismatch";
6827
6828 case status_append_invalid_root: return "Unable to append nodes: root is not an element or document";
6829
6830 case status_no_document_element: return "No document element found";
6831
6832 default: return "Unknown error";
6833 }
6834 }
6835
6836 PUGI__FN xml_document::xml_document(): _buffer(0)
6837 {
6838 _create();
6839 }
6840
6841 PUGI__FN xml_document::~xml_document()
6842 {
6843 _destroy();
6844 }
6845
6846#ifdef PUGIXML_HAS_MOVE
6847 PUGI__FN xml_document::xml_document(xml_document&& rhs) PUGIXML_NOEXCEPT_IF_NOT_COMPACTnoexcept: _buffer(0)
6848 {
6849 _create();
6850 _move(rhs);
6851 }
6852
6853 PUGI__FN xml_document& xml_document::operator=(xml_document&& rhs) PUGIXML_NOEXCEPT_IF_NOT_COMPACTnoexcept
6854 {
6855 if (this == &rhs) return *this;
6856
6857 _destroy();
6858 _create();
6859 _move(rhs);
6860
6861 return *this;
6862 }
6863#endif
6864
6865 PUGI__FN void xml_document::reset()
6866 {
6867 _destroy();
6868 _create();
6869 }
6870
6871 PUGI__FN void xml_document::reset(const xml_document& proto)
6872 {
6873 reset();
6874
6875 for (xml_node cur = proto.first_child(); cur; cur = cur.next_sibling())
6876 append_copy(cur);
6877 }
6878
6879 PUGI__FN void xml_document::_create()
6880 {
6881 assert(!_root)(static_cast <bool> (!_root) ? void (0) : __assert_fail
("!_root", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 6881, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
6882
6883 #ifdef PUGIXML_COMPACT
6884 // space for page marker for the first page (uint32_t), rounded up to pointer size; assumes pointers are at least 32-bit
6885 const size_t page_offset = sizeof(void*);
6886 #else
6887 const size_t page_offset = 0;
6888 #endif
6889
6890 // initialize sentinel page
6891 PUGI__STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(impl::xml_memory_page) + sizeof(impl::xml_document_struct) + page_offset <= sizeof(_memory));
6892
6893 // prepare page structure
6894 impl::xml_memory_page* page = impl::xml_memory_page::construct(_memory);
6895 assert(page)(static_cast <bool> (page) ? void (0) : __assert_fail (
"page", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 6895, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
6896
6897 page->busy_size = impl::xml_memory_page_size;
6898
6899 // setup first page marker
6900 #ifdef PUGIXML_COMPACT
6901 // round-trip through void* to avoid 'cast increases required alignment of target type' warning
6902 page->compact_page_marker = reinterpret_cast<uint32_t*>(static_cast<void*>(reinterpret_cast<char*>(page) + sizeof(impl::xml_memory_page)));
6903 *page->compact_page_marker = sizeof(impl::xml_memory_page);
6904 #endif
6905
6906 // allocate new root
6907 _root = new (reinterpret_cast<char*>(page) + sizeof(impl::xml_memory_page) + page_offset) impl::xml_document_struct(page);
6908 _root->prev_sibling_c = _root;
6909
6910 // setup sentinel page
6911 page->allocator = static_cast<impl::xml_document_struct*>(_root);
6912
6913 // setup hash table pointer in allocator
6914 #ifdef PUGIXML_COMPACT
6915 page->allocator->_hash = &static_cast<impl::xml_document_struct*>(_root)->hash;
6916 #endif
6917
6918 // verify the document allocation
6919 assert(reinterpret_cast<char*>(_root) + sizeof(impl::xml_document_struct) <= _memory + sizeof(_memory))(static_cast <bool> (reinterpret_cast<char*>(_root
) + sizeof(impl::xml_document_struct) <= _memory + sizeof(
_memory)) ? void (0) : __assert_fail ("reinterpret_cast<char*>(_root) + sizeof(impl::xml_document_struct) <= _memory + sizeof(_memory)"
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 6919, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
6920 }
6921
6922 PUGI__FN void xml_document::_destroy()
6923 {
6924 assert(_root)(static_cast <bool> (_root) ? void (0) : __assert_fail (
"_root", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 6924, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
6925
6926 // destroy static storage
6927 if (_buffer)
6928 {
6929 impl::xml_memory::deallocate(_buffer);
6930 _buffer = 0;
6931 }
6932
6933 // destroy extra buffers (note: no need to destroy linked list nodes, they're allocated using document allocator)
6934 for (impl::xml_extra_buffer* extra = static_cast<impl::xml_document_struct*>(_root)->extra_buffers; extra; extra = extra->next)
6935 {
6936 if (extra->buffer) impl::xml_memory::deallocate(extra->buffer);
6937 }
6938
6939 // destroy dynamic storage, leave sentinel page (it's in static memory)
6940 impl::xml_memory_page* root_page = PUGI__GETPAGE(_root);
6941 assert(root_page && !root_page->prev)(static_cast <bool> (root_page && !root_page->
prev) ? void (0) : __assert_fail ("root_page && !root_page->prev"
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 6941, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
6942 assert(reinterpret_cast<char*>(root_page) >= _memory && reinterpret_cast<char*>(root_page) < _memory + sizeof(_memory))(static_cast <bool> (reinterpret_cast<char*>(root_page
) >= _memory && reinterpret_cast<char*>(root_page
) < _memory + sizeof(_memory)) ? void (0) : __assert_fail (
"reinterpret_cast<char*>(root_page) >= _memory && reinterpret_cast<char*>(root_page) < _memory + sizeof(_memory)"
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 6942, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
6943
6944 for (impl::xml_memory_page* page = root_page->next; page; )
6945 {
6946 impl::xml_memory_page* next = page->next;
6947
6948 impl::xml_allocator::deallocate_page(page);
6949
6950 page = next;
6951 }
6952
6953 #ifdef PUGIXML_COMPACT
6954 // destroy hash table
6955 static_cast<impl::xml_document_struct*>(_root)->hash.clear();
6956 #endif
6957
6958 _root = 0;
6959 }
6960
6961#ifdef PUGIXML_HAS_MOVE
6962 PUGI__FN void xml_document::_move(xml_document& rhs) PUGIXML_NOEXCEPT_IF_NOT_COMPACTnoexcept
6963 {
6964 impl::xml_document_struct* doc = static_cast<impl::xml_document_struct*>(_root);
6965 impl::xml_document_struct* other = static_cast<impl::xml_document_struct*>(rhs._root);
6966
6967 // save first child pointer for later; this needs hash access
6968 xml_node_struct* other_first_child = other->first_child;
6969
6970 #ifdef PUGIXML_COMPACT
6971 // reserve space for the hash table up front; this is the only operation that can fail
6972 // if it does, we have no choice but to throw (if we have exceptions)
6973 if (other_first_child)
6974 {
6975 size_t other_children = 0;
6976 for (xml_node_struct* node = other_first_child; node; node = node->next_sibling)
6977 other_children++;
6978
6979 // in compact mode, each pointer assignment could result in a hash table request
6980 // during move, we have to relocate document first_child and parents of all children
6981 // normally there's just one child and its parent has a pointerless encoding but
6982 // we assume the worst here
6983 if (!other->_hash->reserve(other_children + 1))
6984 {
6985 #ifdef PUGIXML_NO_EXCEPTIONS
6986 return;
6987 #else
6988 throw std::bad_alloc();
6989 #endif
6990 }
6991 }
6992 #endif
6993
6994 // move allocation state
6995 doc->_root = other->_root;
6996 doc->_busy_size = other->_busy_size;
6997
6998 // move buffer state
6999 doc->buffer = other->buffer;
7000 doc->extra_buffers = other->extra_buffers;
7001 _buffer = rhs._buffer;
7002
7003 #ifdef PUGIXML_COMPACT
7004 // move compact hash; note that the hash table can have pointers to other but they will be "inactive", similarly to nodes removed with remove_child
7005 doc->hash = other->hash;
7006 doc->_hash = &doc->hash;
7007
7008 // make sure we don't access other hash up until the end when we reinitialize other document
7009 other->_hash = 0;
7010 #endif
7011
7012 // move page structure
7013 impl::xml_memory_page* doc_page = PUGI__GETPAGE(doc);
7014 assert(doc_page && !doc_page->prev && !doc_page->next)(static_cast <bool> (doc_page && !doc_page->
prev && !doc_page->next) ? void (0) : __assert_fail
("doc_page && !doc_page->prev && !doc_page->next"
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 7014, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
7015
7016 impl::xml_memory_page* other_page = PUGI__GETPAGE(other);
7017 assert(other_page && !other_page->prev)(static_cast <bool> (other_page && !other_page->
prev) ? void (0) : __assert_fail ("other_page && !other_page->prev"
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 7017, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
7018
7019 // relink pages since root page is embedded into xml_document
7020 if (impl::xml_memory_page* page = other_page->next)
7021 {
7022 assert(page->prev == other_page)(static_cast <bool> (page->prev == other_page) ? void
(0) : __assert_fail ("page->prev == other_page", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 7022, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
7023
7024 page->prev = doc_page;
7025
7026 doc_page->next = page;
7027 other_page->next = 0;
7028 }
7029
7030 // make sure pages point to the correct document state
7031 for (impl::xml_memory_page* page = doc_page->next; page; page = page->next)
7032 {
7033 assert(page->allocator == other)(static_cast <bool> (page->allocator == other) ? void
(0) : __assert_fail ("page->allocator == other", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 7033, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
7034
7035 page->allocator = doc;
7036
7037 #ifdef PUGIXML_COMPACT
7038 // this automatically migrates most children between documents and prevents ->parent assignment from allocating
7039 if (page->compact_shared_parent == other)
7040 page->compact_shared_parent = doc;
7041 #endif
7042 }
7043
7044 // move tree structure
7045 assert(!doc->first_child)(static_cast <bool> (!doc->first_child) ? void (0) :
__assert_fail ("!doc->first_child", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 7045, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
7046
7047 doc->first_child = other_first_child;
7048
7049 for (xml_node_struct* node = other_first_child; node; node = node->next_sibling)
7050 {
7051 #ifdef PUGIXML_COMPACT
7052 // most children will have migrated when we reassigned compact_shared_parent
7053 assert(node->parent == other || node->parent == doc)(static_cast <bool> (node->parent == other || node->
parent == doc) ? void (0) : __assert_fail ("node->parent == other || node->parent == doc"
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 7053, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
7054
7055 node->parent = doc;
7056 #else
7057 assert(node->parent == other)(static_cast <bool> (node->parent == other) ? void (
0) : __assert_fail ("node->parent == other", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 7057, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
7058 node->parent = doc;
7059 #endif
7060 }
7061
7062 // reset other document
7063 new (other) impl::xml_document_struct(PUGI__GETPAGE(other));
7064 rhs._buffer = 0;
7065 }
7066#endif
7067
7068#ifndef PUGIXML_NO_STL
7069 PUGI__FN xml_parse_result xml_document::load(std::basic_istream<char, std::char_traits<char> >& stream, unsigned int options, xml_encoding encoding)
7070 {
7071 reset();
7072
7073 return impl::load_stream_impl(static_cast<impl::xml_document_struct*>(_root), stream, options, encoding, &_buffer);
7074 }
7075
7076 PUGI__FN xml_parse_result xml_document::load(std::basic_istream<wchar_t, std::char_traits<wchar_t> >& stream, unsigned int options)
7077 {
7078 reset();
7079
7080 return impl::load_stream_impl(static_cast<impl::xml_document_struct*>(_root), stream, options, encoding_wchar, &_buffer);
7081 }
7082#endif
7083
7084 PUGI__FN xml_parse_result xml_document::load_string(const char_t* contents, unsigned int options)
7085 {
7086 // Force native encoding (skip autodetection)
7087 #ifdef PUGIXML_WCHAR_MODE
7088 xml_encoding encoding = encoding_wchar;
7089 #else
7090 xml_encoding encoding = encoding_utf8;
7091 #endif
7092
7093 return load_buffer(contents, impl::strlength(contents) * sizeof(char_t), options, encoding);
7094 }
7095
7096 PUGI__FN xml_parse_result xml_document::load(const char_t* contents, unsigned int options)
7097 {
7098 return load_string(contents, options);
7099 }
7100
7101 PUGI__FN xml_parse_result xml_document::load_file(const char* path_, unsigned int options, xml_encoding encoding)
7102 {
7103 reset();
7104
7105 using impl::auto_deleter; // MSVC7 workaround
7106 auto_deleter<FILE> file(fopen(path_, "rb"), impl::close_file);
7107
7108 return impl::load_file_impl(static_cast<impl::xml_document_struct*>(_root), file.data, options, encoding, &_buffer);
7109 }
7110
7111 PUGI__FN xml_parse_result xml_document::load_file(const wchar_t* path_, unsigned int options, xml_encoding encoding)
7112 {
7113 reset();
7114
7115 using impl::auto_deleter; // MSVC7 workaround
7116 auto_deleter<FILE> file(impl::open_file_wide(path_, L"rb"), impl::close_file);
7117
7118 return impl::load_file_impl(static_cast<impl::xml_document_struct*>(_root), file.data, options, encoding, &_buffer);
7119 }
7120
7121 PUGI__FN xml_parse_result xml_document::load_buffer(const void* contents, size_t size, unsigned int options, xml_encoding encoding)
7122 {
7123 reset();
7124
7125 return impl::load_buffer_impl(static_cast<impl::xml_document_struct*>(_root), _root, const_cast<void*>(contents), size, options, encoding, false, false, &_buffer);
7126 }
7127
7128 PUGI__FN xml_parse_result xml_document::load_buffer_inplace(void* contents, size_t size, unsigned int options, xml_encoding encoding)
7129 {
7130 reset();
7131
7132 return impl::load_buffer_impl(static_cast<impl::xml_document_struct*>(_root), _root, contents, size, options, encoding, true, false, &_buffer);
7133 }
7134
7135 PUGI__FN xml_parse_result xml_document::load_buffer_inplace_own(void* contents, size_t size, unsigned int options, xml_encoding encoding)
7136 {
7137 reset();
7138
7139 return impl::load_buffer_impl(static_cast<impl::xml_document_struct*>(_root), _root, contents, size, options, encoding, true, true, &_buffer);
7140 }
7141
7142 PUGI__FN void xml_document::save(xml_writer& writer, const char_t* indent, unsigned int flags, xml_encoding encoding) const
7143 {
7144 impl::xml_buffered_writer buffered_writer(writer, encoding);
7145
7146 if ((flags & format_write_bom) && encoding != encoding_latin1)
7147 {
7148 // BOM always represents the codepoint U+FEFF, so just write it in native encoding
7149 #ifdef PUGIXML_WCHAR_MODE
7150 unsigned int bom = 0xfeff;
7151 buffered_writer.write(static_cast<wchar_t>(bom));
7152 #else
7153 buffered_writer.write('\xef', '\xbb', '\xbf');
7154 #endif
7155 }
7156
7157 if (!(flags & format_no_declaration) && !impl::has_declaration(_root))
7158 {
7159 buffered_writer.write_string(PUGIXML_TEXT("<?xml version=\"1.0\"")"<?xml version=\"1.0\"");
7160 if (encoding == encoding_latin1) buffered_writer.write_string(PUGIXML_TEXT(" encoding=\"ISO-8859-1\"")" encoding=\"ISO-8859-1\"");
7161 buffered_writer.write('?', '>');
7162 if (!(flags & format_raw)) buffered_writer.write('\n');
7163 }
7164
7165 impl::node_output(buffered_writer, _root, indent, flags, 0);
7166
7167 buffered_writer.flush();
7168 }
7169
7170#ifndef PUGIXML_NO_STL
7171 PUGI__FN void xml_document::save(std::basic_ostream<char, std::char_traits<char> >& stream, const char_t* indent, unsigned int flags, xml_encoding encoding) const
7172 {
7173 xml_writer_stream writer(stream);
7174
7175 save(writer, indent, flags, encoding);
7176 }
7177
7178 PUGI__FN void xml_document::save(std::basic_ostream<wchar_t, std::char_traits<wchar_t> >& stream, const char_t* indent, unsigned int flags) const
7179 {
7180 xml_writer_stream writer(stream);
7181
7182 save(writer, indent, flags, encoding_wchar);
7183 }
7184#endif
7185
7186 PUGI__FN bool xml_document::save_file(const char* path_, const char_t* indent, unsigned int flags, xml_encoding encoding) const
7187 {
7188 using impl::auto_deleter; // MSVC7 workaround
7189 auto_deleter<FILE> file(fopen(path_, (flags & format_save_file_text) ? "w" : "wb"), impl::close_file);
7190
7191 return impl::save_file_impl(*this, file.data, indent, flags, encoding);
7192 }
7193
7194 PUGI__FN bool xml_document::save_file(const wchar_t* path_, const char_t* indent, unsigned int flags, xml_encoding encoding) const
7195 {
7196 using impl::auto_deleter; // MSVC7 workaround
7197 auto_deleter<FILE> file(impl::open_file_wide(path_, (flags & format_save_file_text) ? L"w" : L"wb"), impl::close_file);
7198
7199 return impl::save_file_impl(*this, file.data, indent, flags, encoding);
7200 }
7201
7202 PUGI__FN xml_node xml_document::document_element() const
7203 {
7204 assert(_root)(static_cast <bool> (_root) ? void (0) : __assert_fail (
"_root", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 7204, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
7205
7206 for (xml_node_struct* i = _root->first_child; i; i = i->next_sibling)
7207 if (PUGI__NODETYPE(i) == node_element)
7208 return xml_node(i);
7209
7210 return xml_node();
7211 }

7213#ifndef PUGIXML_NO_STL

7215 {
7216 assert(str)(static_cast <bool> (str) ? void (0) : __assert_fail ("str"
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 7216, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
7217
7218 return impl::as_utf8_impl(str, impl::strlength_wide(str));
7219 }
7220

7222 {
7223 return impl::as_utf8_impl(str.c_str(), str.size());
7224 }
7225

7227 {
7228 assert(str)(static_cast <bool> (str) ? void (0) : __assert_fail ("str"
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 7228, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
7229
7230 return impl::as_wide_impl(str, strlen(str));
7231 }

7234 {

7236 }

7239 PUGI__FN void PUGIXML_FUNCTION set_memory_management_functions(allocation_function allocate, deallocation_function deallocate)
7240 {
7241 impl::xml_memory::allocate = allocate;
7242 impl::xml_memory::deallocate = deallocate;
7243 }
7244
7245 PUGI__FN allocation_function PUGIXML_FUNCTION get_memory_allocation_function()
7246 {
7247 return impl::xml_memory::allocate;
7248 }
7249
7250 PUGI__FN deallocation_function PUGIXML_FUNCTION get_memory_deallocation_function()
7251 {
7252 return impl::xml_memory::deallocate;
7253 }

7256#if !defined(PUGIXML_NO_STL) && (defined(_MSC_VER) || defined(__ICC))

7258{
7259 // Workarounds for (non-standard) iterator category detection for older versions (MSVC7/IC8 and earlier)
7260 PUGI__FN std::bidirectional_iterator_tag _Iter_cat(const pugi::xml_node_iterator&)
7261 {
7262 return std::bidirectional_iterator_tag();
7263 }

7266 {
7267 return std::bidirectional_iterator_tag();
7268 }

7270 PUGI__FN std::bidirectional_iterator_tag _Iter_cat(const pugi::xml_named_node_iterator&)
7271 {
7272 return std::bidirectional_iterator_tag();
7273 }
7274}
7275#endif

7278namespace std
7279{
7280 // Workarounds for (non-standard) iterator category detection
7281 PUGI__FN std::bidirectional_iterator_tag __iterator_category(const pugi::xml_node_iterator&)
7282 {
7283 return std::bidirectional_iterator_tag();
7284 }

7287 {
7288 return std::bidirectional_iterator_tag();
7289 }
