7297
7298#ifndef PUGIXML_NO_XPATH
7299// STL replacements
7300PUGI__NS_BEGIN
7301 struct equal_to
7302 {
7303 template <typename T> bool operator()(const T& lhs, const T& rhs) const
7304 {
7305 return lhs == rhs;
7306 }
7307 };
7308
7309 struct not_equal_to
7310 {
7311 template <typename T> bool operator()(const T& lhs, const T& rhs) const
7312 {
7313 return lhs != rhs;
7314 }
7315 };
7316
7317 struct less
7318 {
7319 template <typename T> bool operator()(const T& lhs, const T& rhs) const
7320 {
7321 return lhs < rhs;
7322 }
7323 };
7324
7325 struct less_equal
7326 {
7327 template <typename T> bool operator()(const T& lhs, const T& rhs) const
7328 {
7329 return lhs <= rhs;
7330 }
7331 };
7332
7333 template <typename T> void swap(T& lhs, T& rhs)
7334 {
7335 T temp = lhs;
7336 lhs = rhs;
7337 rhs = temp;
7338 }
7339
7340 template <typename I, typename Pred> I min_element(I begin, I end, const Pred& pred)
7341 {
7342 I result = begin;
7343
7344 for (I it = begin + 1; it != end; ++it)
7345 if (pred(*it, *result))
7346 result = it;
7347
7348 return result;
7349 }
7350
7351 template <typename I> void reverse(I begin, I end)
7352 {
7353 while (end - begin > 1) swap(*begin++, *--end);
7354 }
7355
7356 template <typename I> I unique(I begin, I end)
7357 {
7358 // fast skip head
7359 while (end - begin > 1 && *begin != *(begin + 1)) begin++;
7360
7361 if (begin == end) return begin;
7362
7363 // last written element
7364 I write = begin++;
7365
7366 // merge unique elements
7367 while (begin != end)
7368 {
7369 if (*begin != *write)
7370 *++write = *begin++;
7371 else
7372 begin++;
7373 }
7374
7375 // past-the-end (write points to live element)
7376 return write + 1;
7377 }
7378
7379 template <typename T, typename Pred> void insertion_sort(T* begin, T* end, const Pred& pred)
7380 {
7381 if (begin == end)
7382 return;
7383
7384 for (T* it = begin + 1; it != end; ++it)
7385 {
7386 T val = *it;
7387 T* hole = it;
7388
7389 // move hole backwards
7390 while (hole > begin && pred(val, *(hole - 1)))
7391 {
7392 *hole = *(hole - 1);
7393 hole--;
7394 }
7395
7396 // fill hole with element
7397 *hole = val;
7398 }
7399 }
7400
7401 template <typename I, typename Pred> I median3(I first, I middle, I last, const Pred& pred)
7402 {
7403 if (pred(*middle, *first)) swap(middle, first);
7404 if (pred(*last, *middle)) swap(last, middle);
7405 if (pred(*middle, *first)) swap(middle, first);
7406
7407 return middle;
7408 }
7409
7410 template <typename T, typename Pred> void partition3(T* begin, T* end, T pivot, const Pred& pred, T** out_eqbeg, T** out_eqend)
7411 {
7412 // invariant: array is split into 4 groups: = < ? > (each variable denotes the boundary between the groups)
7413 T* eq = begin;
7414 T* lt = begin;
7415 T* gt = end;
7416
7417 while (lt < gt)
7418 {
7419 if (pred(*lt, pivot))
7420 lt++;
7421 else if (*lt == pivot)
7422 swap(*eq++, *lt++);
7423 else
7424 swap(*lt, *--gt);
7425 }
7426
7427 // we now have just 4 groups: = < >; move equal elements to the middle
7428 T* eqbeg = gt;
7429
7430 for (T* it = begin; it != eq; ++it)
7431 swap(*it, *--eqbeg);
7432
7433 *out_eqbeg = eqbeg;
7434 *out_eqend = gt;
7435 }
7436
7437 template <typename I, typename Pred> void sort(I begin, I end, const Pred& pred)
7438 {
7439 // sort large chunks
7440 while (end - begin > 16)
7441 {
7442 // find median element
7443 I middle = begin + (end - begin) / 2;
7444 I median = median3(begin, middle, end - 1, pred);
7445
7446 // partition in three chunks (< = >)
7447 I eqbeg, eqend;
7448 partition3(begin, end, *median, pred, &eqbeg, &eqend);
7449
7450 // loop on larger half
7451 if (eqbeg - begin > end - eqend)
7452 {
7453 sort(eqend, end, pred);
7454 end = eqbeg;
7455 }
7456 else
7457 {
7458 sort(begin, eqbeg, pred);
7459 begin = eqend;
7460 }
7461 }
7462
7463 // insertion sort small chunk
7464 insertion_sort(begin, end, pred);
7465 }
7466PUGI__NS_END
7467
7468// Allocator used for AST and evaluation stacks
7469PUGI__NS_BEGIN
7470 static const size_t xpath_memory_page_size =
7471 #ifdef PUGIXML_MEMORY_XPATH_PAGE_SIZE
7472 PUGIXML_MEMORY_XPATH_PAGE_SIZE
7473 #else
7474 4096
7475 #endif
7476 ;
7477
7478 static const uintptr_t xpath_memory_block_alignment = sizeof(double) > sizeof(void*) ? sizeof(double) : sizeof(void*);
7479
7480 struct xpath_memory_block
7481 {
7482 xpath_memory_block* next;
7483 size_t capacity;
7484
7485 union
7486 {
7487 char data[xpath_memory_page_size];
7488 double alignment;
7489 };
7490 };
7491
7492 struct xpath_allocator
7493 {
7494 xpath_memory_block* _root;
7495 size_t _root_size;
7496 bool* _error;
7497
7498 xpath_allocator(xpath_memory_block* root, bool* error = 0): _root(root), _root_size(0), _error(error)
7499 {
7500 }
7501
7502 void* allocate(size_t size)
7503 {
7504 // round size up to block alignment boundary
7505 size = (size + xpath_memory_block_alignment - 1) & ~(xpath_memory_block_alignment - 1);
7506
7507 if (_root_size + size <= _root->capacity)
7508 {
7509 void* buf = &_root->data[0] + _root_size;
7510 _root_size += size;
7511 return buf;
7512 }
7513 else
7514 {
7515 // make sure we have at least 1/4th of the page free after allocation to satisfy subsequent allocation requests
7516 size_t block_capacity_base = sizeof(_root->data);
7517 size_t block_capacity_req = size + block_capacity_base / 4;
7518 size_t block_capacity = (block_capacity_base > block_capacity_req) ? block_capacity_base : block_capacity_req;
7519
7520 size_t block_size = block_capacity + offsetof(xpath_memory_block, data)__builtin_offsetof(xpath_memory_block, data);
7521
7522 xpath_memory_block* block = static_cast<xpath_memory_block*>(xml_memory::allocate(block_size));
7523 if (!block)
7524 {
7525 if (_error) *_error = true;
7526 return 0;
7527 }
7528
7529 block->next = _root;
7530 block->capacity = block_capacity;
7531
7532 _root = block;
7533 _root_size = size;
7534
7535 return block->data;
7536 }
7537 }
7538
7539 void* reallocate(void* ptr, size_t old_size, size_t new_size)
7540 {
7541 // round size up to block alignment boundary
7542 old_size = (old_size + xpath_memory_block_alignment - 1) & ~(xpath_memory_block_alignment - 1);
7543 new_size = (new_size + xpath_memory_block_alignment - 1) & ~(xpath_memory_block_alignment - 1);
7544
7545 // we can only reallocate the last object
7546 assert(ptr == 0 || static_cast<char*>(ptr) + old_size == &_root->data[0] + _root_size)(static_cast <bool> (ptr == 0 || static_cast<char*>
(ptr) + old_size == &_root->data[0] + _root_size) ? void
(0) : __assert_fail ("ptr == 0 || static_cast<char*>(ptr) + old_size == &_root->data[0] + _root_size"
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 7546, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
7547
7548 // try to reallocate the object inplace
7549 if (ptr && _root_size - old_size + new_size <= _root->capacity)
7550 {
7551 _root_size = _root_size - old_size + new_size;
7552 return ptr;
7553 }
7554
7555 // allocate a new block
7556 void* result = allocate(new_size);
7557 if (!result) return 0;
7558
7559 // we have a new block
7560 if (ptr)
7561 {
7562 // copy old data (we only support growing)
7563 assert(new_size >= old_size)(static_cast <bool> (new_size >= old_size) ? void (0
) : __assert_fail ("new_size >= old_size", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 7563, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
7564 memcpy(result, ptr, old_size);
7565
7566 // free the previous page if it had no other objects
7567 assert(_root->data == result)(static_cast <bool> (_root->data == result) ? void (
0) : __assert_fail ("_root->data == result", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 7567, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
7568 assert(_root->next)(static_cast <bool> (_root->next) ? void (0) : __assert_fail
("_root->next", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 7568, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
7569
7570 if (_root->next->data == ptr)
7571 {
7572 // deallocate the whole page, unless it was the first one
7573 xpath_memory_block* next = _root->next->next;
7574
7575 if (next)
7576 {
7577 xml_memory::deallocate(_root->next);
7578 _root->next = next;
7579 }
7580 }
7581 }
7582
7583 return result;
7584 }
7585
7586 void revert(const xpath_allocator& state)
7587 {
7588 // free all new pages
7589 xpath_memory_block* cur = _root;
7590
7591 while (cur != state._root)
7592 {
7593 xpath_memory_block* next = cur->next;
7594
7595 xml_memory::deallocate(cur);
7596
7597 cur = next;
7598 }
7599
7600 // restore state
7601 _root = state._root;
7602 _root_size = state._root_size;
7603 }
7604
7605 void release()
7606 {
7607 xpath_memory_block* cur = _root;
7608 assert(cur)(static_cast <bool> (cur) ? void (0) : __assert_fail ("cur"
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 7608, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
7609
7610 while (cur->next)
7611 {
7612 xpath_memory_block* next = cur->next;
7613
7614 xml_memory::deallocate(cur);
7615
7616 cur = next;
7617 }
7618 }
7619 };
7620
7621 struct xpath_allocator_capture
7622 {
7623 xpath_allocator_capture(xpath_allocator* alloc): _target(alloc), _state(*alloc)
7624 {
7625 }
7626
7627 ~xpath_allocator_capture()
7628 {
7629 _target->revert(_state);
7630 }
7631
7632 xpath_allocator* _target;
7633 xpath_allocator _state;
7634 };
7635
7636 struct xpath_stack
7637 {
7638 xpath_allocator* result;
7639 xpath_allocator* temp;
7640 };
7641
7642 struct xpath_stack_data
7643 {
7644 xpath_memory_block blocks[2];
7645 xpath_allocator result;
7646 xpath_allocator temp;
7647 xpath_stack stack;
7648 bool oom;
7649
7650 xpath_stack_data(): result(blocks + 0, &oom), temp(blocks + 1, &oom), oom(false)
7651 {
7652 blocks[0].next = blocks[1].next = 0;
7653 blocks[0].capacity = blocks[1].capacity = sizeof(blocks[0].data);
7654
7655 stack.result = &result;
7656 stack.temp = &temp;
7657 }
7658
7659 ~xpath_stack_data()
7660 {
7661 result.release();
7662 temp.release();
7663 }
7664 };
7665PUGI__NS_END
7666
7667// String class
7668PUGI__NS_BEGIN
7669 class xpath_string
7670 {
7671 const char_t* _buffer;
7672 bool _uses_heap;
7673 size_t _length_heap;
7674
7675 static char_t* duplicate_string(const char_t* string, size_t length, xpath_allocator* alloc)
7676 {
7677 char_t* result = static_cast<char_t*>(alloc->allocate((length + 1) * sizeof(char_t)));
7678 if (!result) return 0;
7679
7680 memcpy(result, string, length * sizeof(char_t));
7681 result[length] = 0;
7682
7683 return result;
7684 }
7685
7686 xpath_string(const char_t* buffer, bool uses_heap_, size_t length_heap): _buffer(buffer), _uses_heap(uses_heap_), _length_heap(length_heap)
7687 {
7688 }
7689
7690 public:
7691 static xpath_string from_const(const char_t* str)
7692 {
7693 return xpath_string(str, false, 0);
7694 }
7695
7696 static xpath_string from_heap_preallocated(const char_t* begin, const char_t* end)
7697 {
7698 assert(begin <= end && *end == 0)(static_cast <bool> (begin <= end && *end ==
0) ? void (0) : __assert_fail ("begin <= end && *end == 0"
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 7698, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
7699
7700 return xpath_string(begin, true, static_cast<size_t>(end - begin));
7701 }
7702
7703 static xpath_string from_heap(const char_t* begin, const char_t* end, xpath_allocator* alloc)
7704 {
7705 assert(begin <= end)(static_cast <bool> (begin <= end) ? void (0) : __assert_fail
("begin <= end", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 7705, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
7706
7707 if (begin == end)
7708 return xpath_string();
7709
7710 size_t length = static_cast<size_t>(end - begin);
7711 const char_t* data = duplicate_string(begin, length, alloc);
7712
7713 return data ? xpath_string(data, true, length) : xpath_string();
7714 }
7715
7716 xpath_string(): _buffer(PUGIXML_TEXT("")""), _uses_heap(false), _length_heap(0)
7717 {
7718 }
7719
7720 void append(const xpath_string& o, xpath_allocator* alloc)
7721 {
7722 // skip empty sources
7723 if (!*o._buffer) return;
7724
7725 // fast append for constant empty target and constant source
7726 if (!*_buffer && !_uses_heap && !o._uses_heap)
7727 {
7728 _buffer = o._buffer;
7729 }
7730 else
7731 {
7732 // need to make heap copy
7733 size_t target_length = length();
7734 size_t source_length = o.length();
7735 size_t result_length = target_length + source_length;
7736
7737 // allocate new buffer
7738 char_t* result = static_cast<char_t*>(alloc->reallocate(_uses_heap ? const_cast<char_t*>(_buffer) : 0, (target_length + 1) * sizeof(char_t), (result_length + 1) * sizeof(char_t)));
7739 if (!result) return;
7740
7741 // append first string to the new buffer in case there was no reallocation
7742 if (!_uses_heap) memcpy(result, _buffer, target_length * sizeof(char_t));
7743
7744 // append second string to the new buffer
7745 memcpy(result + target_length, o._buffer, source_length * sizeof(char_t));
7746 result[result_length] = 0;
7747
7748 // finalize
7749 _buffer = result;
7750 _uses_heap = true;
7751 _length_heap = result_length;
7752 }
7753 }
7754
7755 const char_t* c_str() const
7756 {
7757 return _buffer;
7758 }
7759
7760 size_t length() const
7761 {
7762 return _uses_heap ? _length_heap : strlength(_buffer);
7763 }
7764
7765 char_t* data(xpath_allocator* alloc)
7766 {
7767 // make private heap copy
7768 if (!_uses_heap)
7769 {
7770 size_t length_ = strlength(_buffer);
7771 const char_t* data_ = duplicate_string(_buffer, length_, alloc);
7772
7773 if (!data_) return 0;
7774
7775 _buffer = data_;
7776 _uses_heap = true;
7777 _length_heap = length_;
7778 }
7779
7780 return const_cast<char_t*>(_buffer);
7781 }
7782
7783 bool empty() const
7784 {
7785 return *_buffer == 0;
7786 }
7787
7788 bool operator==(const xpath_string& o) const
7789 {
7790 return strequal(_buffer, o._buffer);
7791 }
7792
7793 bool operator!=(const xpath_string& o) const
7794 {
7795 return !strequal(_buffer, o._buffer);
7796 }
7797
7798 bool uses_heap() const
7799 {
7800 return _uses_heap;
7801 }
7802 };
7803PUGI__NS_END
7804
7805PUGI__NS_BEGIN
7806 PUGI__FN bool starts_with(const char_t* string, const char_t* pattern)
7807 {
7808 while (*pattern && *string == *pattern)
7809 {
7810 string++;
7811 pattern++;
7812 }
7813
7814 return *pattern == 0;
7815 }
7816
7817 PUGI__FN const char_t* find_char(const char_t* s, char_t c)
7818 {
7819 #ifdef PUGIXML_WCHAR_MODE
7820 return wcschr(s, c);
7821 #else
7822 return strchr(s, c);
7823 #endif
7824 }
7825
7826 PUGI__FN const char_t* find_substring(const char_t* s, const char_t* p)
7827 {
7828 #ifdef PUGIXML_WCHAR_MODE
7829 // MSVC6 wcsstr bug workaround (if s is empty it always returns 0)
7830 return (*p == 0) ? s : wcsstr(s, p);
7831 #else
7832 return strstr(s, p);
7833 #endif
7834 }
7835
7836 // Converts symbol to lower case, if it is an ASCII one
7837 PUGI__FN char_t tolower_ascii(char_t ch)
7838 {
7839 return static_cast<unsigned int>(ch - 'A') < 26 ? static_cast<char_t>(ch | ' ') : ch;
7840 }
7841
7842 PUGI__FN xpath_string string_value(const xpath_node& na, xpath_allocator* alloc)
7843 {
7844 if (na.attribute())
7845 return xpath_string::from_const(na.attribute().value());
7846 else
7847 {
7848 xml_node n = na.node();
7849
7850 switch (n.type())
7851 {
7852 case node_pcdata:
7853 case node_cdata:
7854 case node_comment:
7855 case node_pi:
7856 return xpath_string::from_const(n.value());
7857
7858 case node_document:
7859 case node_element:
7860 {
7861 xpath_string result;
7862
7863 // element nodes can have value if parse_embed_pcdata was used
7864 if (n.value()[0])
7865 result.append(xpath_string::from_const(n.value()), alloc);
7866
7867 xml_node cur = n.first_child();
7868
7869 while (cur && cur != n)
7870 {
7871 if (cur.type() == node_pcdata || cur.type() == node_cdata)
7872 result.append(xpath_string::from_const(cur.value()), alloc);
7873
7874 if (cur.first_child())
7875 cur = cur.first_child();
7876 else if (cur.next_sibling())
7877 cur = cur.next_sibling();
7878 else
7879 {
7880 while (!cur.next_sibling() && cur != n)
7881 cur = cur.parent();
7882
7883 if (cur != n) cur = cur.next_sibling();
7884 }
7885 }
7886
7887 return result;
7888 }
7889
7890 default:
7891 return xpath_string();
7892 }
7893 }
7894 }
7895
7896 PUGI__FN bool node_is_before_sibling(xml_node_struct* ln, xml_node_struct* rn)
7897 {
7898 assert(ln->parent == rn->parent)(static_cast <bool> (ln->parent == rn->parent) ? void
(0) : __assert_fail ("ln->parent == rn->parent", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 7898, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
7899
7900 // there is no common ancestor (the shared parent is null), nodes are from different documents
7901 if (!ln->parent) return ln < rn;
7902
7903 // determine sibling order
7904 xml_node_struct* ls = ln;
7905 xml_node_struct* rs = rn;
7906
7907 while (ls && rs)
7908 {
7909 if (ls == rn) return true;
7910 if (rs == ln) return false;
7911
7912 ls = ls->next_sibling;
7913 rs = rs->next_sibling;
7914 }
7915
7916 // if rn sibling chain ended ln must be before rn
7917 return !rs;
7918 }
7919
7920 PUGI__FN bool node_is_before(xml_node_struct* ln, xml_node_struct* rn)
7921 {
7922 // find common ancestor at the same depth, if any
7923 xml_node_struct* lp = ln;
7924 xml_node_struct* rp = rn;
7925
7926 while (lp && rp && lp->parent != rp->parent)
7927 {
7928 lp = lp->parent;
7929 rp = rp->parent;
7930 }
7931
7932 // parents are the same!
7933 if (lp && rp) return node_is_before_sibling(lp, rp);
7934
7935 // nodes are at different depths, need to normalize heights
7936 bool left_higher = !lp;
7937
7938 while (lp)
7939 {
7940 lp = lp->parent;
7941 ln = ln->parent;
7942 }
7943
7944 while (rp)
7945 {
7946 rp = rp->parent;
7947 rn = rn->parent;
7948 }
7949
7950 // one node is the ancestor of the other
7951 if (ln == rn) return left_higher;
7952
7953 // find common ancestor... again
7954 while (ln->parent != rn->parent)
7955 {
7956 ln = ln->parent;
7957 rn = rn->parent;
7958 }
7959
7960 return node_is_before_sibling(ln, rn);
7961 }
7962
7963 PUGI__FN bool node_is_ancestor(xml_node_struct* parent, xml_node_struct* node)
7964 {
7965 while (node && node != parent) node = node->parent;
7966
7967 return parent && node == parent;
7968 }
7969
7970 PUGI__FN const void* document_buffer_order(const xpath_node& xnode)
7971 {
7972 xml_node_struct* node = xnode.node().internal_object();
7973
7974 if (node)
7975 {
7976 if ((get_document(node).header & xml_memory_page_contents_shared_mask) == 0)
7977 {
7978 if (node->name && (node->header & impl::xml_memory_page_name_allocated_or_shared_mask) == 0) return node->name;
7979 if (node->value && (node->header & impl::xml_memory_page_value_allocated_or_shared_mask) == 0) return node->value;
7980 }
7981
7982 return 0;
7983 }
7984
7985 xml_attribute_struct* attr = xnode.attribute().internal_object();
7986
7987 if (attr)
7988 {
7989 if ((get_document(attr).header & xml_memory_page_contents_shared_mask) == 0)
7990 {
7991 if ((attr->header & impl::xml_memory_page_name_allocated_or_shared_mask) == 0) return attr->name;
7992 if ((attr->header & impl::xml_memory_page_value_allocated_or_shared_mask) == 0) return attr->value;
7993 }
7994
7995 return 0;
7996 }
7997
7998 return 0;
7999 }
8000
8001 struct document_order_comparator
8002 {
8003 bool operator()(const xpath_node& lhs, const xpath_node& rhs) const
8004 {
8005 // optimized document order based check
8006 const void* lo = document_buffer_order(lhs);
8007 const void* ro = document_buffer_order(rhs);
8008
8009 if (lo && ro) return lo < ro;
8010
8011 // slow comparison
8012 xml_node ln = lhs.node(), rn = rhs.node();
8013
8014 // compare attributes
8015 if (lhs.attribute() && rhs.attribute())
8016 {
8017 // shared parent
8018 if (lhs.parent() == rhs.parent())
8019 {
8020 // determine sibling order
8021 for (xml_attribute a = lhs.attribute(); a; a = a.next_attribute())
8022 if (a == rhs.attribute())
8023 return true;
8024
8025 return false;
8026 }
8027
8028 // compare attribute parents
8029 ln = lhs.parent();
8030 rn = rhs.parent();
8031 }
8032 else if (lhs.attribute())
8033 {
8034 // attributes go after the parent element
8035 if (lhs.parent() == rhs.node()) return false;
8036
8037 ln = lhs.parent();
8038 }
8039 else if (rhs.attribute())
8040 {
8041 // attributes go after the parent element
8042 if (rhs.parent() == lhs.node()) return true;
8043
8044 rn = rhs.parent();
8045 }
8046
8047 if (ln == rn) return false;
8048
8049 if (!ln || !rn) return ln < rn;
8050
8051 return node_is_before(ln.internal_object(), rn.internal_object());
8052 }
8053 };
8054
8055 struct duplicate_comparator
8056 {
8057 bool operator()(const xpath_node& lhs, const xpath_node& rhs) const
8058 {
8059 if (lhs.attribute()) return rhs.attribute() ? lhs.attribute() < rhs.attribute() : true;
8060 else return rhs.attribute() ? false : lhs.node() < rhs.node();
8061 }
8062 };
8063
8064 PUGI__FN double gen_nan()
8065 {
8066 #if defined(__STDC_IEC_559__1) || ((FLT_RADIX2 - 0 == 2) && (FLT_MAX_EXP128 - 0 == 128) && (FLT_MANT_DIG24 - 0 == 24))
8067 PUGI__STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(float) == sizeof(uint32_t));
8068 typedef uint32_t UI; // BCC5 workaround
8069 union { float f; UI i; } u;
8070 u.i = 0x7fc00000;
8071 return u.f;
8072 #else
8073 // fallback
8074 const volatile double zero = 0.0;
8075 return zero / zero;
8076 #endif
8077 }
8078
8079 PUGI__FN bool is_nan(double value)
8080 {
8081 #if defined(PUGI__MSVC_CRT_VERSION) || defined(__BORLANDC__)
8082 return !!_isnan(value);
8083 #elif defined(fpclassify) && defined(FP_NAN0)
8084 return fpclassify(value) == FP_NAN0;
8085 #else
8086 // fallback
8087 const volatile double v = value;
8088 return v != v;
8089 #endif
8090 }
8091
8092 PUGI__FN const char_t* convert_number_to_string_special(double value)
8093 {
8094 #if defined(PUGI__MSVC_CRT_VERSION) || defined(__BORLANDC__)
8095 if (_finite(value)) return (value == 0) ? PUGIXML_TEXT("0")"0" : 0;
8096 if (_isnan(value)) return PUGIXML_TEXT("NaN")"NaN";
8097 return value > 0 ? PUGIXML_TEXT("Infinity")"Infinity" : PUGIXML_TEXT("-Infinity")"-Infinity";
8098 #elif defined(fpclassify) && defined(FP_NAN0) && defined(FP_INFINITE1) && defined(FP_ZERO2)
8099 switch (fpclassify(value))
8100 {
8101 case FP_NAN0:
8102 return PUGIXML_TEXT("NaN")"NaN";
8103
8104 case FP_INFINITE1:
8105 return value > 0 ? PUGIXML_TEXT("Infinity")"Infinity" : PUGIXML_TEXT("-Infinity")"-Infinity";
8106
8107 case FP_ZERO2:
8108 return PUGIXML_TEXT("0")"0";
8109
8110 default:
8111 return 0;
8112 }
8113 #else
8114 // fallback
8115 const volatile double v = value;
8116
8117 if (v == 0) return PUGIXML_TEXT("0")"0";
8118 if (v != v) return PUGIXML_TEXT("NaN")"NaN";
8119 if (v * 2 == v) return value > 0 ? PUGIXML_TEXT("Infinity")"Infinity" : PUGIXML_TEXT("-Infinity")"-Infinity";
8120 return 0;
8121 #endif
8122 }
8123
8124 PUGI__FN bool convert_number_to_boolean(double value)
8125 {
8126 return (value != 0 && !is_nan(value));
8127 }
8128
8129 PUGI__FN void truncate_zeros(char* begin, char* end)
8130 {
8131 while (begin != end && end[-1] == '0') end--;
8132
8133 *end = 0;
8134 }
8135
8136 // gets mantissa digits in the form of 0.xxxxx with 0. implied and the exponent
8137#if defined(PUGI__MSVC_CRT_VERSION) && PUGI__MSVC_CRT_VERSION >= 1400 && !defined(_WIN32_WCE)
8138 PUGI__FN void convert_number_to_mantissa_exponent(double value, char (&buffer)[32], char** out_mantissa, int* out_exponent)
8139 {
8140 // get base values
8141 int sign, exponent;
8142 _ecvt_s(buffer, sizeof(buffer), value, DBL_DIG15 + 1, &exponent, &sign);
8143
8144 // truncate redundant zeros
8145 truncate_zeros(buffer, buffer + strlen(buffer));
8146
8147 // fill results
8148 *out_mantissa = buffer;
8149 *out_exponent = exponent;
8150 }
8151#else
8152 PUGI__FN void convert_number_to_mantissa_exponent(double value, char (&buffer)[32], char** out_mantissa, int* out_exponent)
8153 {
8154 // get a scientific notation value with IEEE DBL_DIG decimals
8155 PUGI__SNPRINTF(buffer, "%.*e", DBL_DIG15, value);
8156
8157 // get the exponent (possibly negative)
8158 char* exponent_string = strchr(buffer, 'e');
8159 assert(exponent_string)(static_cast <bool> (exponent_string) ? void (0) : __assert_fail
("exponent_string", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 8159, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
8160
8161 int exponent = atoi(exponent_string + 1);
8162
8163 // extract mantissa string: skip sign
8164 char* mantissa = buffer[0] == '-' ? buffer + 1 : buffer;
8165 assert(mantissa[0] != '0' && mantissa[1] == '.')(static_cast <bool> (mantissa[0] != '0' && mantissa
[1] == '.') ? void (0) : __assert_fail ("mantissa[0] != '0' && mantissa[1] == '.'"
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 8165, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
8166
8167 // divide mantissa by 10 to eliminate integer part
8168 mantissa[1] = mantissa[0];
8169 mantissa++;
8170 exponent++;
8171
8172 // remove extra mantissa digits and zero-terminate mantissa
8173 truncate_zeros(mantissa, exponent_string);
8174
8175 // fill results
8176 *out_mantissa = mantissa;
8177 *out_exponent = exponent;
8178 }
8179#endif
8180
8181 PUGI__FN xpath_string convert_number_to_string(double value, xpath_allocator* alloc)
8182 {
8183 // try special number conversion
8184 const char_t* special = convert_number_to_string_special(value);
8185 if (special) return xpath_string::from_const(special);
8186
8187 // get mantissa + exponent form
8188 char mantissa_buffer[32];
8189
8190 char* mantissa;
8191 int exponent;
8192 convert_number_to_mantissa_exponent(value, mantissa_buffer, &mantissa, &exponent);
8193
8194 // allocate a buffer of suitable length for the number
8195 size_t result_size = strlen(mantissa_buffer) + (exponent > 0 ? exponent : -exponent) + 4;
8196 char_t* result = static_cast<char_t*>(alloc->allocate(sizeof(char_t) * result_size));
8197 if (!result) return xpath_string();
8198
8199 // make the number!
8200 char_t* s = result;
8201
8202 // sign
8203 if (value < 0) *s++ = '-';
8204
8205 // integer part
8206 if (exponent <= 0)
8207 {
8208 *s++ = '0';
8209 }
8210 else
8211 {
8212 while (exponent > 0)
8213 {
8214 assert(*mantissa == 0 || static_cast<unsigned int>(*mantissa - '0') <= 9)(static_cast <bool> (*mantissa == 0 || static_cast<unsigned
int>(*mantissa - '0') <= 9) ? void (0) : __assert_fail
("*mantissa == 0 || static_cast<unsigned int>(*mantissa - '0') <= 9"
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 8214, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
8215 *s++ = *mantissa ? *mantissa++ : '0';
8216 exponent--;
8217 }
8218 }
8219
8220 // fractional part
8221 if (*mantissa)
8222 {
8223 // decimal point
8224 *s++ = '.';
8225
8226 // extra zeroes from negative exponent
8227 while (exponent < 0)
8228 {
8229 *s++ = '0';
8230 exponent++;
8231 }
8232
8233 // extra mantissa digits
8234 while (*mantissa)
8235 {
8236 assert(static_cast<unsigned int>(*mantissa - '0') <= 9)(static_cast <bool> (static_cast<unsigned int>(*mantissa
- '0') <= 9) ? void (0) : __assert_fail ("static_cast<unsigned int>(*mantissa - '0') <= 9"
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 8236, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
8237 *s++ = *mantissa++;
8238 }
8239 }
8240
8241 // zero-terminate
8242 assert(s < result + result_size)(static_cast <bool> (s < result + result_size) ? void
(0) : __assert_fail ("s < result + result_size", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 8242, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
8243 *s = 0;
8244
8245 return xpath_string::from_heap_preallocated(result, s);
8246 }
8247
8248 PUGI__FN bool check_string_to_number_format(const char_t* string)
8249 {
8250 // parse leading whitespace
8251 while (PUGI__IS_CHARTYPE(*string, ct_space)) ++string;
8252
8253 // parse sign
8254 if (*string == '-') ++string;
8255
8256 if (!*string) return false;
8257
8258 // if there is no integer part, there should be a decimal part with at least one digit
8259 if (!PUGI__IS_CHARTYPEX(string[0], ctx_digit) && (string[0] != '.' || !PUGI__IS_CHARTYPEX(string[1], ctx_digit))) return false;
8260
8261 // parse integer part
8262 while (PUGI__IS_CHARTYPEX(*string, ctx_digit)) ++string;
8263
8264 // parse decimal part
8265 if (*string == '.')
8266 {
8267 ++string;
8268
8269 while (PUGI__IS_CHARTYPEX(*string, ctx_digit)) ++string;
8270 }
8271
8272 // parse trailing whitespace
8273 while (PUGI__IS_CHARTYPE(*string, ct_space)) ++string;
8274
8275 return *string == 0;
8276 }
8277
8278 PUGI__FN double convert_string_to_number(const char_t* string)
8279 {
8280 // check string format
8281 if (!check_string_to_number_format(string)) return gen_nan();
8282
8283 // parse string
8284 #ifdef PUGIXML_WCHAR_MODE
8285 return wcstod(string, 0);
8286 #else
8287 return strtod(string, 0);
8288 #endif
8289 }
8290
8291 PUGI__FN bool convert_string_to_number_scratch(char_t (&buffer)[32], const char_t* begin, const char_t* end, double* out_result)
8292 {
8293 size_t length = static_cast<size_t>(end - begin);
8294 char_t* scratch = buffer;
8295
8296 if (length >= sizeof(buffer) / sizeof(buffer[0]))
8297 {
8298 // need to make dummy on-heap copy
8299 scratch = static_cast<char_t*>(xml_memory::allocate((length + 1) * sizeof(char_t)));
8300 if (!scratch) return false;
8301 }
8302
8303 // copy string to zero-terminated buffer and perform conversion
8304 memcpy(scratch, begin, length * sizeof(char_t));
8305 scratch[length] = 0;
8306
8307 *out_result = convert_string_to_number(scratch);
8308
8309 // free dummy buffer
8310 if (scratch != buffer) xml_memory::deallocate(scratch);
8311
8312 return true;
8313 }
8314
8315 PUGI__FN double round_nearest(double value)
8316 {
8317 return floor(value + 0.5);
8318 }
8319
8320 PUGI__FN double round_nearest_nzero(double value)
8321 {
8322 // same as round_nearest, but returns -0 for [-0.5, -0]
8323 // ceil is used to differentiate between +0 and -0 (we return -0 for [-0.5, -0] and +0 for +0)
8324 return (value >= -0.5 && value <= 0) ? ceil(value) : floor(value + 0.5);
8325 }
8326
8327 PUGI__FN const char_t* qualified_name(const xpath_node& node)
8328 {
8329 return node.attribute() ? node.attribute().name() : node.node().name();
8330 }
8331
8332 PUGI__FN const char_t* local_name(const xpath_node& node)
8333 {
8334 const char_t* name = qualified_name(node);
8335 const char_t* p = find_char(name, ':');
8336
8337 return p ? p + 1 : name;
8338 }
8339
8340 struct namespace_uri_predicate
8341 {
8342 const char_t* prefix;
8343 size_t prefix_length;
8344
8345 namespace_uri_predicate(const char_t* name)
8346 {
8347 const char_t* pos = find_char(name, ':');
8348
8349 prefix = pos ? name : 0;
8350 prefix_length = pos ? static_cast<size_t>(pos - name) : 0;
8351 }
8352
8353 bool operator()(xml_attribute a) const
8354 {
8355 const char_t* name = a.name();
8356
8357 if (!starts_with(name, PUGIXML_TEXT("xmlns")"xmlns")) return false;
8358
8359 return prefix ? name[5] == ':' && strequalrange(name + 6, prefix, prefix_length) : name[5] == 0;
8360 }
8361 };
8362
8363 PUGI__FN const char_t* namespace_uri(xml_node node)
8364 {
8365 namespace_uri_predicate pred = node.name();
8366
8367 xml_node p = node;
8368
8369 while (p)
8370 {
8371 xml_attribute a = p.find_attribute(pred);
8372
8373 if (a) return a.value();
8374
8375 p = p.parent();
8376 }
8377
8378 return PUGIXML_TEXT("")"";
8379 }
8380
8381 PUGI__FN const char_t* namespace_uri(xml_attribute attr, xml_node parent)
8382 {
8383 namespace_uri_predicate pred = attr.name();
8384
8385 // Default namespace does not apply to attributes
8386 if (!pred.prefix) return PUGIXML_TEXT("")"";
8387
8388 xml_node p = parent;
8389
8390 while (p)
8391 {
8392 xml_attribute a = p.find_attribute(pred);
8393
8394 if (a) return a.value();
8395
8396 p = p.parent();
8397 }
8398
8399 return PUGIXML_TEXT("")"";
8400 }
8401
8402 PUGI__FN const char_t* namespace_uri(const xpath_node& node)
8403 {
8404 return node.attribute() ? namespace_uri(node.attribute(), node.parent()) : namespace_uri(node.node());
8405 }
8406
8407 PUGI__FN char_t* normalize_space(char_t* buffer)
8408 {
8409 char_t* write = buffer;
8410
8411 for (char_t* it = buffer; *it; )
8412 {
8413 char_t ch = *it++;
8414
8415 if (PUGI__IS_CHARTYPE(ch, ct_space))
8416 {
8417 // replace whitespace sequence with single space
8418 while (PUGI__IS_CHARTYPE(*it, ct_space)) it++;
8419
8420 // avoid leading spaces
8421 if (write != buffer) *write++ = ' ';
8422 }
8423 else *write++ = ch;
8424 }
8425
8426 // remove trailing space
8427 if (write != buffer && PUGI__IS_CHARTYPE(write[-1], ct_space)) write--;
8428
8429 // zero-terminate
8430 *write = 0;
8431
8432 return write;
8433 }
8434
8435 PUGI__FN char_t* translate(char_t* buffer, const char_t* from, const char_t* to, size_t to_length)
8436 {
8437 char_t* write = buffer;
8438
8439 while (*buffer)
8440 {
8441 PUGI__DMC_VOLATILE char_t ch = *buffer++;
8442
8443 const char_t* pos = find_char(from, ch);
8444
8445 if (!pos)
8446 *write++ = ch; // do not process
8447 else if (static_cast<size_t>(pos - from) < to_length)
8448 *write++ = to[pos - from]; // replace
8449 }
8450
8451 // zero-terminate
8452 *write = 0;
8453
8454 return write;
8455 }
8456
8457 PUGI__FN unsigned char* translate_table_generate(xpath_allocator* alloc, const char_t* from, const char_t* to)
8458 {
8459 unsigned char table[128] = {0};
8460
8461 while (*from)
8462 {
8463 unsigned int fc = static_cast<unsigned int>(*from);
8464 unsigned int tc = static_cast<unsigned int>(*to);
8465
8466 if (fc >= 128 || tc >= 128)
8467 return 0;
8468
8469 // code=128 means "skip character"
8470 if (!table[fc])
8471 table[fc] = static_cast<unsigned char>(tc ? tc : 128);
8472
8473 from++;
8474 if (tc) to++;
8475 }
8476
8477 for (int i = 0; i < 128; ++i)
8478 if (!table[i])
8479 table[i] = static_cast<unsigned char>(i);
8480
8481 void* result = alloc->allocate(sizeof(table));
8482 if (!result) return 0;
8483
8484 memcpy(result, table, sizeof(table));
8485
8486 return static_cast<unsigned char*>(result);
8487 }
8488
8489 PUGI__FN char_t* translate_table(char_t* buffer, const unsigned char* table)
8490 {
8491 char_t* write = buffer;
8492
8493 while (*buffer)
8494 {
8495 char_t ch = *buffer++;
8496 unsigned int index = static_cast<unsigned int>(ch);
8497
8498 if (index < 128)
8499 {
8500 unsigned char code = table[index];
8501
8502 // code=128 means "skip character" (table size is 128 so 128 can be a special value)
8503 // this code skips these characters without extra branches
8504 *write = static_cast<char_t>(code);
8505 write += 1 - (code >> 7);
8506 }
8507 else
8508 {
8509 *write++ = ch;
8510 }
8511 }
8512
8513 // zero-terminate
8514 *write = 0;
8515
8516 return write;
8517 }
8518
8519 inline bool is_xpath_attribute(const char_t* name)
8520 {
8521 return !(starts_with(name, PUGIXML_TEXT("xmlns")"xmlns") && (name[5] == 0 || name[5] == ':'));
8522 }
8523
8524 struct xpath_variable_boolean: xpath_variable
8525 {
8526 xpath_variable_boolean(): xpath_variable(xpath_type_boolean), value(false)
8527 {
8528 }
8529
8530 bool value;
8531 char_t name[1];
8532 };
8533
8534 struct xpath_variable_number: xpath_variable
8535 {
8536 xpath_variable_number(): xpath_variable(xpath_type_number), value(0)
8537 {
8538 }
8539
8540 double value;
8541 char_t name[1];
8542 };
8543
8544 struct xpath_variable_string: xpath_variable
8545 {
8546 xpath_variable_string(): xpath_variable(xpath_type_string), value(0)
8547 {
8548 }
8549
8550 ~xpath_variable_string()
8551 {
8552 if (value) xml_memory::deallocate(value);
8553 }
8554
8555 char_t* value;
8556 char_t name[1];
8557 };
8558
8559 struct xpath_variable_node_set: xpath_variable
8560 {
8561 xpath_variable_node_set(): xpath_variable(xpath_type_node_set)
8562 {
8563 }
8564
8565 xpath_node_set value;
8566 char_t name[1];
8567 };
8568
8569 static const xpath_node_set dummy_node_set;
8570
8571 PUGI__FN PUGI__UNSIGNED_OVERFLOW unsigned int hash_string(const char_t* str)
8572 {
8573 // Jenkins one-at-a-time hash (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jenkins_hash_function#one-at-a-time)
8574 unsigned int result = 0;
8575
8576 while (*str)
8577 {
8578 result += static_cast<unsigned int>(*str++);
8579 result += result << 10;
8580 result ^= result >> 6;
8581 }
8582
8583 result += result << 3;
8584 result ^= result >> 11;
8585 result += result << 15;
8586
8587 return result;
8588 }
8589
8590 template <typename T> PUGI__FN T* new_xpath_variable(const char_t* name)
8591 {
8592 size_t length = strlength(name);
8593 if (length == 0) return 0; // empty variable names are invalid
8594
8595 // $$ we can't use offsetof(T, name) because T is non-POD, so we just allocate additional length characters
8596 void* memory = xml_memory::allocate(sizeof(T) + length * sizeof(char_t));
8597 if (!memory) return 0;
8598
8599 T* result = new (memory) T();
8600
8601 memcpy(result->name, name, (length + 1) * sizeof(char_t));
8602
8603 return result;
8604 }
8605
8606 PUGI__FN xpath_variable* new_xpath_variable(xpath_value_type type, const char_t* name)
8607 {
8608 switch (type)
8609 {
8610 case xpath_type_node_set:
8611 return new_xpath_variable<xpath_variable_node_set>(name);
8612
8613 case xpath_type_number:
8614 return new_xpath_variable<xpath_variable_number>(name);
8615
8616 case xpath_type_string:
8617 return new_xpath_variable<xpath_variable_string>(name);
8618
8619 case xpath_type_boolean:
8620 return new_xpath_variable<xpath_variable_boolean>(name);
8621
8622 default:
8623 return 0;
8624 }
8625 }
8626
8627 template <typename T> PUGI__FN void delete_xpath_variable(T* var)
8628 {
8629 var->~T();
8630 xml_memory::deallocate(var);
8631 }
8632
8633 PUGI__FN void delete_xpath_variable(xpath_value_type type, xpath_variable* var)
8634 {
8635 switch (type)
8636 {
8637 case xpath_type_node_set:
8638 delete_xpath_variable(static_cast<xpath_variable_node_set*>(var));
8639 break;
8640
8641 case xpath_type_number:
8642 delete_xpath_variable(static_cast<xpath_variable_number*>(var));
8643 break;
8644
8645 case xpath_type_string:
8646 delete_xpath_variable(static_cast<xpath_variable_string*>(var));
8647 break;
8648
8649 case xpath_type_boolean:
8650 delete_xpath_variable(static_cast<xpath_variable_boolean*>(var));
8651 break;
8652
8653 default:
8654 assert(false && "Invalid variable type")(static_cast <bool> (false && "Invalid variable type"
) ? void (0) : __assert_fail ("false && \"Invalid variable type\""
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 8654, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__)); // unreachable
8655 }
8656 }
8657
8658 PUGI__FN bool copy_xpath_variable(xpath_variable* lhs, const xpath_variable* rhs)
8659 {
8660 switch (rhs->type())
8661 {
8662 case xpath_type_node_set:
8663 return lhs->set(static_cast<const xpath_variable_node_set*>(rhs)->value);
8664
8665 case xpath_type_number:
8666 return lhs->set(static_cast<const xpath_variable_number*>(rhs)->value);
8667
8668 case xpath_type_string:
8669 return lhs->set(static_cast<const xpath_variable_string*>(rhs)->value);
8670
8671 case xpath_type_boolean:
8672 return lhs->set(static_cast<const xpath_variable_boolean*>(rhs)->value);
8673
8674 default:
8675 assert(false && "Invalid variable type")(static_cast <bool> (false && "Invalid variable type"
) ? void (0) : __assert_fail ("false && \"Invalid variable type\""
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 8675, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__)); // unreachable
8676 return false;
8677 }
8678 }
8679
8680 PUGI__FN bool get_variable_scratch(char_t (&buffer)[32], xpath_variable_set* set, const char_t* begin, const char_t* end, xpath_variable** out_result)
8681 {
8682 size_t length = static_cast<size_t>(end - begin);
8683 char_t* scratch = buffer;
8684
8685 if (length >= sizeof(buffer) / sizeof(buffer[0]))
8686 {
8687 // need to make dummy on-heap copy
8688 scratch = static_cast<char_t*>(xml_memory::allocate((length + 1) * sizeof(char_t)));
8689 if (!scratch) return false;
8690 }
8691
8692 // copy string to zero-terminated buffer and perform lookup
8693 memcpy(scratch, begin, length * sizeof(char_t));
8694 scratch[length] = 0;
8695
8696 *out_result = set->get(scratch);
8697
8698 // free dummy buffer
8699 if (scratch != buffer) xml_memory::deallocate(scratch);
8700
8701 return true;
8702 }
8703PUGI__NS_END
8704
8705// Internal node set class
8706PUGI__NS_BEGIN
8707 PUGI__FN xpath_node_set::type_t xpath_get_order(const xpath_node* begin, const xpath_node* end)
8708 {
8709 if (end - begin < 2)
8710 return xpath_node_set::type_sorted;
8711
8712 document_order_comparator cmp;
8713
8714 bool first = cmp(begin[0], begin[1]);
8715
8716 for (const xpath_node* it = begin + 1; it + 1 < end; ++it)
8717 if (cmp(it[0], it[1]) != first)
8718 return xpath_node_set::type_unsorted;
8719
8720 return first ? xpath_node_set::type_sorted : xpath_node_set::type_sorted_reverse;
8721 }
8722
8723 PUGI__FN xpath_node_set::type_t xpath_sort(xpath_node* begin, xpath_node* end, xpath_node_set::type_t type, bool rev)
8724 {
8725 xpath_node_set::type_t order = rev ? xpath_node_set::type_sorted_reverse : xpath_node_set::type_sorted;
8726
8727 if (type == xpath_node_set::type_unsorted)
8728 {
8729 xpath_node_set::type_t sorted = xpath_get_order(begin, end);
8730
8731 if (sorted == xpath_node_set::type_unsorted)
8732 {
8733 sort(begin, end, document_order_comparator());
8734
8735 type = xpath_node_set::type_sorted;
8736 }
8737 else
8738 type = sorted;
8739 }
8740
8741 if (type != order) reverse(begin, end);
8742
8743 return order;
8744 }
8745
8746 PUGI__FN xpath_node xpath_first(const xpath_node* begin, const xpath_node* end, xpath_node_set::type_t type)
8747 {
8748 if (begin == end) return xpath_node();
8749
8750 switch (type)
8751 {
8752 case xpath_node_set::type_sorted:
8753 return *begin;
8754
8755 case xpath_node_set::type_sorted_reverse:
8756 return *(end - 1);
8757
8758 case xpath_node_set::type_unsorted:
8759 return *min_element(begin, end, document_order_comparator());
8760
8761 default:
8762 assert(false && "Invalid node set type")(static_cast <bool> (false && "Invalid node set type"
) ? void (0) : __assert_fail ("false && \"Invalid node set type\""
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 8762, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__)); // unreachable
8763 return xpath_node();
8764 }
8765 }
8766
8767 class xpath_node_set_raw
8768 {
8769 xpath_node_set::type_t _type;
8770
8771 xpath_node* _begin;
8772 xpath_node* _end;
8773 xpath_node* _eos;
8774
8775 public:
8776 xpath_node_set_raw(): _type(xpath_node_set::type_unsorted), _begin(0), _end(0), _eos(0)
8777 {
8778 }
8779
8780 xpath_node* begin() const
8781 {
8782 return _begin;
8783 }
8784
8785 xpath_node* end() const
8786 {
8787 return _end;
8788 }
8789
8790 bool empty() const
8791 {
8792 return _begin == _end;
8793 }
8794
8795 size_t size() const
8796 {
8797 return static_cast<size_t>(_end - _begin);
8798 }
8799
8800 xpath_node first() const
8801 {
8802 return xpath_first(_begin, _end, _type);
8803 }
8804
8805 void push_back_grow(const xpath_node& node, xpath_allocator* alloc);
8806
8807 void push_back(const xpath_node& node, xpath_allocator* alloc)
8808 {
8809 if (_end != _eos)
8810 *_end++ = node;
8811 else
8812 push_back_grow(node, alloc);
8813 }
8814
8815 void append(const xpath_node* begin_, const xpath_node* end_, xpath_allocator* alloc)
8816 {
8817 if (begin_ == end_) return;
8818
8819 size_t size_ = static_cast<size_t>(_end - _begin);
8820 size_t capacity = static_cast<size_t>(_eos - _begin);
8821 size_t count = static_cast<size_t>(end_ - begin_);
8822
8823 if (size_ + count > capacity)
8824 {
8825 // reallocate the old array or allocate a new one
8826 xpath_node* data = static_cast<xpath_node*>(alloc->reallocate(_begin, capacity * sizeof(xpath_node), (size_ + count) * sizeof(xpath_node)));
8827 if (!data) return;
8828
8829 // finalize
8830 _begin = data;
8831 _end = data + size_;
8832 _eos = data + size_ + count;
8833 }
8834
8835 memcpy(_end, begin_, count * sizeof(xpath_node));
8836 _end += count;
8837 }
8838
8839 void sort_do()
8840 {
8841 _type = xpath_sort(_begin, _end, _type, false);
8842 }
8843
8844 void truncate(xpath_node* pos)
8845 {
8846 assert(_begin <= pos && pos <= _end)(static_cast <bool> (_begin <= pos && pos <=
_end) ? void (0) : __assert_fail ("_begin <= pos && pos <= _end"
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 8846, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
8847
8848 _end = pos;
8849 }
8850
8851 void remove_duplicates()
8852 {
8853 if (_type == xpath_node_set::type_unsorted)
8854 sort(_begin, _end, duplicate_comparator());
8855
8856 _end = unique(_begin, _end);
8857 }
8858
8859 xpath_node_set::type_t type() const
8860 {
8861 return _type;
8862 }
8863
8864 void set_type(xpath_node_set::type_t value)
8865 {
8866 _type = value;
8867 }
8868 };
8869
8870 PUGI__FN_NO_INLINE void xpath_node_set_raw::push_back_grow(const xpath_node& node, xpath_allocator* alloc)
8871 {
8872 size_t capacity = static_cast<size_t>(_eos - _begin);
8873
8874 // get new capacity (1.5x rule)
8875 size_t new_capacity = capacity + capacity / 2 + 1;
8876
8877 // reallocate the old array or allocate a new one
8878 xpath_node* data = static_cast<xpath_node*>(alloc->reallocate(_begin, capacity * sizeof(xpath_node), new_capacity * sizeof(xpath_node)));
8879 if (!data) return;
8880
8881 // finalize
8882 _begin = data;
8883 _end = data + capacity;
8884 _eos = data + new_capacity;
8885
8886 // push
8887 *_end++ = node;
8888 }
8889PUGI__NS_END
8890
8891PUGI__NS_BEGIN
8892 struct xpath_context
8893 {
8894 xpath_node n;
8895 size_t position, size;
8896
8897 xpath_context(const xpath_node& n_, size_t position_, size_t size_): n(n_), position(position_), size(size_)
8898 {
8899 }
8900 };
8901
8902 enum lexeme_t
8903 {
8904 lex_none = 0,
8905 lex_equal,
8906 lex_not_equal,
8907 lex_less,
8908 lex_greater,
8909 lex_less_or_equal,
8910 lex_greater_or_equal,
8911 lex_plus,
8912 lex_minus,
8913 lex_multiply,
8914 lex_union,
8915 lex_var_ref,
8916 lex_open_brace,
8917 lex_close_brace,
8918 lex_quoted_string,
8919 lex_number,
8920 lex_slash,
8921 lex_double_slash,
8922 lex_open_square_brace,
8923 lex_close_square_brace,
8924 lex_string,
8925 lex_comma,
8926 lex_axis_attribute,
8927 lex_dot,
8928 lex_double_dot,
8929 lex_double_colon,
8930 lex_eof
8931 };
8932
8933 struct xpath_lexer_string
8934 {
8935 const char_t* begin;
8936 const char_t* end;
8937
8938 xpath_lexer_string(): begin(0), end(0)
8939 {
8940 }
8941
8942 bool operator==(const char_t* other) const
8943 {
8944 size_t length = static_cast<size_t>(end - begin);
8945
8946 return strequalrange(other, begin, length);
8947 }
8948 };
8949
8950 class xpath_lexer
8951 {
8952 const char_t* _cur;
8953 const char_t* _cur_lexeme_pos;
8954 xpath_lexer_string _cur_lexeme_contents;
8955
8956 lexeme_t _cur_lexeme;
8957
8958 public:
8959 explicit xpath_lexer(const char_t* query): _cur(query)
8960 {
8961 next();
8962 }
8963
8964 const char_t* state() const
8965 {
8966 return _cur;
8967 }
8968
8969 void next()
8970 {
8971 const char_t* cur = _cur;
8972
8973 while (PUGI__IS_CHARTYPE(*cur, ct_space)) ++cur;
8974
8975 // save lexeme position for error reporting
8976 _cur_lexeme_pos = cur;
8977
8978 switch (*cur)
8979 {
8980 case 0:
8981 _cur_lexeme = lex_eof;
8982 break;
8983
8984 case '>':
8985 if (*(cur+1) == '=')
8986 {
8987 cur += 2;
8988 _cur_lexeme = lex_greater_or_equal;
8989 }
8990 else
8991 {
8992 cur += 1;
8993 _cur_lexeme = lex_greater;
8994 }
8995 break;
8996
8997 case '<':
8998 if (*(cur+1) == '=')
8999 {
9000 cur += 2;
9001 _cur_lexeme = lex_less_or_equal;
9002 }
9003 else
9004 {
9005 cur += 1;
9006 _cur_lexeme = lex_less;
9007 }
9008 break;
9009
9010 case '!':
9011 if (*(cur+1) == '=')
9012 {
9013 cur += 2;
9014 _cur_lexeme = lex_not_equal;
9015 }
9016 else
9017 {
9018 _cur_lexeme = lex_none;
9019 }
9020 break;
9021
9022 case '=':
9023 cur += 1;
9024 _cur_lexeme = lex_equal;
9025
9026 break;
9027
9028 case '+':
9029 cur += 1;
9030 _cur_lexeme = lex_plus;
9031
9032 break;
9033
9034 case '-':
9035 cur += 1;
9036 _cur_lexeme = lex_minus;
9037
9038 break;
9039
9040 case '*':
9041 cur += 1;
9042 _cur_lexeme = lex_multiply;
9043
9044 break;
9045
9046 case '|':
9047 cur += 1;
9048 _cur_lexeme = lex_union;
9049
9050 break;
9051
9052 case '$':
9053 cur += 1;
9054
9055 if (PUGI__IS_CHARTYPEX(*cur, ctx_start_symbol))
9056 {
9057 _cur_lexeme_contents.begin = cur;
9058
9059 while (PUGI__IS_CHARTYPEX(*cur, ctx_symbol)) cur++;
9060
9061 if (cur[0] == ':' && PUGI__IS_CHARTYPEX(cur[1], ctx_symbol)) // qname
9062 {
9063 cur++; // :
9064
9065 while (PUGI__IS_CHARTYPEX(*cur, ctx_symbol)) cur++;
9066 }
9067
9068 _cur_lexeme_contents.end = cur;
9069
9070 _cur_lexeme = lex_var_ref;
9071 }
9072 else
9073 {
9074 _cur_lexeme = lex_none;
9075 }
9076
9077 break;
9078
9079 case '(':
9080 cur += 1;
9081 _cur_lexeme = lex_open_brace;
9082
9083 break;
9084
9085 case ')':
9086 cur += 1;
9087 _cur_lexeme = lex_close_brace;
9088
9089 break;
9090
9091 case '[':
9092 cur += 1;
9093 _cur_lexeme = lex_open_square_brace;
9094
9095 break;
9096
9097 case ']':
9098 cur += 1;
9099 _cur_lexeme = lex_close_square_brace;
9100
9101 break;
9102
9103 case ',':
9104 cur += 1;
9105 _cur_lexeme = lex_comma;
9106
9107 break;
9108
9109 case '/':
9110 if (*(cur+1) == '/')
9111 {
9112 cur += 2;
9113 _cur_lexeme = lex_double_slash;
9114 }
9115 else
9116 {
9117 cur += 1;
9118 _cur_lexeme = lex_slash;
9119 }
9120 break;
9121
9122 case '.':
9123 if (*(cur+1) == '.')
9124 {
9125 cur += 2;
9126 _cur_lexeme = lex_double_dot;
9127 }
9128 else if (PUGI__IS_CHARTYPEX(*(cur+1), ctx_digit))
9129 {
9130 _cur_lexeme_contents.begin = cur; // .
9131
9132 ++cur;
9133
9134 while (PUGI__IS_CHARTYPEX(*cur, ctx_digit)) cur++;
9135
9136 _cur_lexeme_contents.end = cur;
9137
9138 _cur_lexeme = lex_number;
9139 }
9140 else
9141 {
9142 cur += 1;
9143 _cur_lexeme = lex_dot;
9144 }
9145 break;
9146
9147 case '@':
9148 cur += 1;
9149 _cur_lexeme = lex_axis_attribute;
9150
9151 break;
9152
9153 case '"':
9154 case '\'':
9155 {
9156 char_t terminator = *cur;
9157
9158 ++cur;
9159
9160 _cur_lexeme_contents.begin = cur;
9161 while (*cur && *cur != terminator) cur++;
9162 _cur_lexeme_contents.end = cur;
9163
9164 if (!*cur)
9165 _cur_lexeme = lex_none;
9166 else
9167 {
9168 cur += 1;
9169 _cur_lexeme = lex_quoted_string;
9170 }
9171
9172 break;
9173 }
9174
9175 case ':':
9176 if (*(cur+1) == ':')
9177 {
9178 cur += 2;
9179 _cur_lexeme = lex_double_colon;
9180 }
9181 else
9182 {
9183 _cur_lexeme = lex_none;
9184 }
9185 break;
9186
9187 default:
9188 if (PUGI__IS_CHARTYPEX(*cur, ctx_digit))
9189 {
9190 _cur_lexeme_contents.begin = cur;
9191
9192 while (PUGI__IS_CHARTYPEX(*cur, ctx_digit)) cur++;
9193
9194 if (*cur == '.')
9195 {
9196 cur++;
9197
9198 while (PUGI__IS_CHARTYPEX(*cur, ctx_digit)) cur++;
9199 }
9200
9201 _cur_lexeme_contents.end = cur;
9202
9203 _cur_lexeme = lex_number;
9204 }
9205 else if (PUGI__IS_CHARTYPEX(*cur, ctx_start_symbol))
9206 {
9207 _cur_lexeme_contents.begin = cur;
9208
9209 while (PUGI__IS_CHARTYPEX(*cur, ctx_symbol)) cur++;
9210
9211 if (cur[0] == ':')
9212 {
9213 if (cur[1] == '*') // namespace test ncname:*
9214 {
9215 cur += 2; // :*
9216 }
9217 else if (PUGI__IS_CHARTYPEX(cur[1], ctx_symbol)) // namespace test qname
9218 {
9219 cur++; // :
9220
9221 while (PUGI__IS_CHARTYPEX(*cur, ctx_symbol)) cur++;
9222 }
9223 }
9224
9225 _cur_lexeme_contents.end = cur;
9226
9227 _cur_lexeme = lex_string;
9228 }
9229 else
9230 {
9231 _cur_lexeme = lex_none;
9232 }
9233 }
9234
9235 _cur = cur;
9236 }
9237
9238 lexeme_t current() const
9239 {
9240 return _cur_lexeme;
9241 }
9242
9243 const char_t* current_pos() const
9244 {
9245 return _cur_lexeme_pos;
9246 }
9247
9248 const xpath_lexer_string& contents() const
9249 {
9250 assert(_cur_lexeme == lex_var_ref || _cur_lexeme == lex_number || _cur_lexeme == lex_string || _cur_lexeme == lex_quoted_string)(static_cast <bool> (_cur_lexeme == lex_var_ref || _cur_lexeme
== lex_number || _cur_lexeme == lex_string || _cur_lexeme ==
lex_quoted_string) ? void (0) : __assert_fail ("_cur_lexeme == lex_var_ref || _cur_lexeme == lex_number || _cur_lexeme == lex_string || _cur_lexeme == lex_quoted_string"
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 9250, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
9251
9252 return _cur_lexeme_contents;
9253 }
9254 };
9255
9256 enum ast_type_t
9257 {
9258 ast_unknown,
9259 ast_op_or, // left or right
9260 ast_op_and, // left and right
9261 ast_op_equal, // left = right
9262 ast_op_not_equal, // left != right
9263 ast_op_less, // left < right
9264 ast_op_greater, // left > right
9265 ast_op_less_or_equal, // left <= right
9266 ast_op_greater_or_equal, // left >= right
9267 ast_op_add, // left + right
9268 ast_op_subtract, // left - right
9269 ast_op_multiply, // left * right
9270 ast_op_divide, // left / right
9271 ast_op_mod, // left % right
9272 ast_op_negate, // left - right
9273 ast_op_union, // left | right
9274 ast_predicate, // apply predicate to set; next points to next predicate
9275 ast_filter, // select * from left where right
9276 ast_string_constant, // string constant
9277 ast_number_constant, // number constant
9278 ast_variable, // variable
9279 ast_func_last, // last()
9280 ast_func_position, // position()
9281 ast_func_count, // count(left)
9282 ast_func_id, // id(left)
9283 ast_func_local_name_0, // local-name()
9284 ast_func_local_name_1, // local-name(left)
9285 ast_func_namespace_uri_0, // namespace-uri()
9286 ast_func_namespace_uri_1, // namespace-uri(left)
9287 ast_func_name_0, // name()
9288 ast_func_name_1, // name(left)
9289 ast_func_string_0, // string()
9290 ast_func_string_1, // string(left)
9291 ast_func_concat, // concat(left, right, siblings)
9292 ast_func_starts_with, // starts_with(left, right)
9293 ast_func_contains, // contains(left, right)
9294 ast_func_substring_before, // substring-before(left, right)
9295 ast_func_substring_after, // substring-after(left, right)
9296 ast_func_substring_2, // substring(left, right)
9297 ast_func_substring_3, // substring(left, right, third)
9298 ast_func_string_length_0, // string-length()
9299 ast_func_string_length_1, // string-length(left)
9300 ast_func_normalize_space_0, // normalize-space()
9301 ast_func_normalize_space_1, // normalize-space(left)
9302 ast_func_translate, // translate(left, right, third)
9303 ast_func_boolean, // boolean(left)
9304 ast_func_not, // not(left)
9305 ast_func_true, // true()
9306 ast_func_false, // false()
9307 ast_func_lang, // lang(left)
9308 ast_func_number_0, // number()
9309 ast_func_number_1, // number(left)
9310 ast_func_sum, // sum(left)
9311 ast_func_floor, // floor(left)
9312 ast_func_ceiling, // ceiling(left)
9313 ast_func_round, // round(left)
9314 ast_step, // process set left with step
9315 ast_step_root, // select root node
9316
9317 ast_opt_translate_table, // translate(left, right, third) where right/third are constants
9318 ast_opt_compare_attribute // @name = 'string'
9319 };

9323 axis_ancestor,
9324 axis_ancestor_or_self,
9325 axis_attribute,
9326 axis_child,

9338 enum nodetest_t
9339 {
9340 nodetest_none,
9341 nodetest_name,
9342 nodetest_type_node,
9343 nodetest_type_comment,

9359 enum nodeset_eval_t
9360 {
9361 nodeset_eval_all,
9362 nodeset_eval_any,
9363 nodeset_eval_first
9364 };
9365
9366 template <axis_t N> struct axis_to_type
9367 {
9368 static const axis_t axis;
9369 };
9370
9371 template <axis_t N> const axis_t axis_to_type<N>::axis = N;
9372
9373 class xpath_ast_node
9374 {
9375 private:
9376 // node type
9377 char _type;
9378 char _rettype;
9379
9380 // for ast_step
9381 char _axis;
9382
9383 // for ast_step/ast_predicate/ast_filter
9384 char _test;
9385
9386 // tree node structure
9387 xpath_ast_node* _left;
9388 xpath_ast_node* _right;
9389 xpath_ast_node* _next;
9390
9391 union
9392 {
9393 // value for ast_string_constant
9394 const char_t* string;
9395 // value for ast_number_constant
9396 double number;
9397 // variable for ast_variable
9398 xpath_variable* variable;
9399 // node test for ast_step (node name/namespace/node type/pi target)
9400 const char_t* nodetest;
9401 // table for ast_opt_translate_table
9402 const unsigned char* table;
9403 } _data;
9404
9405 xpath_ast_node(const xpath_ast_node&);
9406 xpath_ast_node& operator=(const xpath_ast_node&);
9407
9408 template <class Comp> static bool compare_eq(xpath_ast_node* lhs, xpath_ast_node* rhs, const xpath_context& c, const xpath_stack& stack, const Comp& comp)
9409 {
9410 xpath_value_type lt = lhs->rettype(), rt = rhs->rettype();
9411
9412 if (lt != xpath_type_node_set && rt != xpath_type_node_set)
9413 {
9414 if (lt == xpath_type_boolean || rt == xpath_type_boolean)
9415 return comp(lhs->eval_boolean(c, stack), rhs->eval_boolean(c, stack));
9416 else if (lt == xpath_type_number || rt == xpath_type_number)
9417 return comp(lhs->eval_number(c, stack), rhs->eval_number(c, stack));
9418 else if (lt == xpath_type_string || rt == xpath_type_string)
9419 {
9420 xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result);
9421
9422 xpath_string ls = lhs->eval_string(c, stack);
9423 xpath_string rs = rhs->eval_string(c, stack);
9424
9425 return comp(ls, rs);
9426 }
9427 }
9428 else if (lt == xpath_type_node_set && rt == xpath_type_node_set)
9429 {
9430 xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result);
9431
9432 xpath_node_set_raw ls = lhs->eval_node_set(c, stack, nodeset_eval_all);
9433 xpath_node_set_raw rs = rhs->eval_node_set(c, stack, nodeset_eval_all);
9434
9435 for (const xpath_node* li = ls.begin(); li != ls.end(); ++li)
9436 for (const xpath_node* ri = rs.begin(); ri != rs.end(); ++ri)
9437 {
9438 xpath_allocator_capture cri(stack.result);
9439
9440 if (comp(string_value(*li, stack.result), string_value(*ri, stack.result)))
9441 return true;
9442 }
9443
9444 return false;
9445 }
9446 else
9447 {
9448 if (lt == xpath_type_node_set)
9449 {
9450 swap(lhs, rhs);
9451 swap(lt, rt);
9452 }
9453
9454 if (lt == xpath_type_boolean)
9455 return comp(lhs->eval_boolean(c, stack), rhs->eval_boolean(c, stack));
9456 else if (lt == xpath_type_number)
9457 {
9458 xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result);
9459
9460 double l = lhs->eval_number(c, stack);
9461 xpath_node_set_raw rs = rhs->eval_node_set(c, stack, nodeset_eval_all);
9462
9463 for (const xpath_node* ri = rs.begin(); ri != rs.end(); ++ri)
9464 {
9465 xpath_allocator_capture cri(stack.result);
9466
9467 if (comp(l, convert_string_to_number(string_value(*ri, stack.result).c_str())))
9468 return true;
9469 }
9470
9471 return false;
9472 }
9473 else if (lt == xpath_type_string)
9474 {
9475 xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result);
9476
9477 xpath_string l = lhs->eval_string(c, stack);
9478 xpath_node_set_raw rs = rhs->eval_node_set(c, stack, nodeset_eval_all);
9479
9480 for (const xpath_node* ri = rs.begin(); ri != rs.end(); ++ri)
9481 {
9482 xpath_allocator_capture cri(stack.result);
9483
9484 if (comp(l, string_value(*ri, stack.result)))
9485 return true;
9486 }
9487
9488 return false;
9489 }
9490 }
9491
9492 assert(false && "Wrong types")(static_cast <bool> (false && "Wrong types") ? void
(0) : __assert_fail ("false && \"Wrong types\"", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 9492, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__)); // unreachable
9493 return false;
9494 }
9495
9496 static bool eval_once(xpath_node_set::type_t type, nodeset_eval_t eval)
9497 {
9498 return type == xpath_node_set::type_sorted ? eval != nodeset_eval_all : eval == nodeset_eval_any;
9499 }
9500
9501 template <class Comp> static bool compare_rel(xpath_ast_node* lhs, xpath_ast_node* rhs, const xpath_context& c, const xpath_stack& stack, const Comp& comp)
9502 {
9503 xpath_value_type lt = lhs->rettype(), rt = rhs->rettype();
9504
9505 if (lt != xpath_type_node_set && rt != xpath_type_node_set)
9506 return comp(lhs->eval_number(c, stack), rhs->eval_number(c, stack));
9507 else if (lt == xpath_type_node_set && rt == xpath_type_node_set)
9508 {
9509 xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result);
9510
9511 xpath_node_set_raw ls = lhs->eval_node_set(c, stack, nodeset_eval_all);
9512 xpath_node_set_raw rs = rhs->eval_node_set(c, stack, nodeset_eval_all);
9513
9514 for (const xpath_node* li = ls.begin(); li != ls.end(); ++li)
9515 {
9516 xpath_allocator_capture cri(stack.result);
9517
9518 double l = convert_string_to_number(string_value(*li, stack.result).c_str());
9519
9520 for (const xpath_node* ri = rs.begin(); ri != rs.end(); ++ri)
9521 {
9522 xpath_allocator_capture crii(stack.result);
9523
9524 if (comp(l, convert_string_to_number(string_value(*ri, stack.result).c_str())))
9525 return true;
9526 }
9527 }
9528
9529 return false;
9530 }
9531 else if (lt != xpath_type_node_set && rt == xpath_type_node_set)
9532 {
9533 xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result);
9534
9535 double l = lhs->eval_number(c, stack);
9536 xpath_node_set_raw rs = rhs->eval_node_set(c, stack, nodeset_eval_all);
9537
9538 for (const xpath_node* ri = rs.begin(); ri != rs.end(); ++ri)
9539 {
9540 xpath_allocator_capture cri(stack.result);
9541
9542 if (comp(l, convert_string_to_number(string_value(*ri, stack.result).c_str())))
9543 return true;
9544 }
9545
9546 return false;
9547 }
9548 else if (lt == xpath_type_node_set && rt != xpath_type_node_set)
9549 {
9550 xpath_allocator_capture cr(stack.result);
9551
9552 xpath_node_set_raw ls = lhs->eval_node_set(c, stack, nodeset_eval_all);
9553 double r = rhs->eval_number(c, stack);
9554
9555 for (const xpath_node* li = ls.begin(); li != ls.end(); ++li)
9556 {
9557 xpath_allocator_capture cri(stack.result);
9558
9559 if (comp(convert_string_to_number(string_value(*li, stack.result).c_str()), r))
9560 return true;
9561 }
9562
9563 return false;
9564 }
9565 else
9566 {
9567 assert(false && "Wrong types")(static_cast <bool> (false && "Wrong types") ? void
(0) : __assert_fail ("false && \"Wrong types\"", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 9567, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__)); // unreachable
9568 return false;
9569 }
9570 }
9571
9572 static void apply_predicate_boolean(xpath_node_set_raw& ns, size_t first, xpath_ast_node* expr, const xpath_stack& stack, bool once)
9573 {
9574 assert(ns.size() >= first)(static_cast <bool> (ns.size() >= first) ? void (0) :
__assert_fail ("ns.size() >= first", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 9574, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
9575 assert(expr->rettype() != xpath_type_number)(static_cast <bool> (expr->rettype() != xpath_type_number
) ? void (0) : __assert_fail ("expr->rettype() != xpath_type_number"
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 9575, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
9576
9577 size_t i = 1;
9578 size_t size = ns.size() - first;
9579
9580 xpath_node* last = ns.begin() + first;
9581
9582 // remove_if... or well, sort of
9583 for (xpath_node* it = last; it != ns.end(); ++it, ++i)
9584 {
9585 xpath_context c(*it, i, size);
9586
9587 if (expr->eval_boolean(c, stack))
9588 {
9589 *last++ = *it;
9590
9591 if (once) break;
9592 }
9593 }
9594
9595 ns.truncate(last);
9596 }
9597
9598 static void apply_predicate_number(xpath_node_set_raw& ns, size_t first, xpath_ast_node* expr, const xpath_stack& stack, bool once)
9599 {
9600 assert(ns.size() >= first)(static_cast <bool> (ns.size() >= first) ? void (0) :
__assert_fail ("ns.size() >= first", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 9600, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
9601 assert(expr->rettype() == xpath_type_number)(static_cast <bool> (expr->rettype() == xpath_type_number
) ? void (0) : __assert_fail ("expr->rettype() == xpath_type_number"
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 9601, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
9602
9603 size_t i = 1;
9604 size_t size = ns.size() - first;
9605
9606 xpath_node* last = ns.begin() + first;
9607
9608 // remove_if... or well, sort of
9609 for (xpath_node* it = last; it != ns.end(); ++it, ++i)
9610 {
9611 xpath_context c(*it, i, size);
9612
9613 if (expr->eval_number(c, stack) == i)
9614 {
9615 *last++ = *it;
9616
9617 if (once) break;
9618 }
9619 }
9620
9621 ns.truncate(last);
9622 }
9623
9624 static void apply_predicate_number_const(xpath_node_set_raw& ns, size_t first, xpath_ast_node* expr, const xpath_stack& stack)
9625 {
9626 assert(ns.size() >= first)(static_cast <bool> (ns.size() >= first) ? void (0) :
__assert_fail ("ns.size() >= first", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 9626, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
9627 assert(expr->rettype() == xpath_type_number)(static_cast <bool> (expr->rettype() == xpath_type_number
) ? void (0) : __assert_fail ("expr->rettype() == xpath_type_number"
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 9627, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
9628
9629 size_t size = ns.size() - first;
9630
9631 xpath_node* last = ns.begin() + first;
9632
9633 xpath_context c(xpath_node(), 1, size);
9634
9635 double er = expr->eval_number(c, stack);
9636
9637 if (er >= 1.0 && er <= size)
9638 {
9639 size_t eri = static_cast<size_t>(er);
9640
9641 if (er == eri)
9642 {
9643 xpath_node r = last[eri - 1];
9644
9645 *last++ = r;
9646 }
9647 }
9648
9649 ns.truncate(last);
9650 }
9651
9652 void apply_predicate(xpath_node_set_raw& ns, size_t first, const xpath_stack& stack, bool once)
9653 {
9654 if (ns.size() == first) return;
9655
9656 assert(_type == ast_filter || _type == ast_predicate)(static_cast <bool> (_type == ast_filter || _type == ast_predicate
) ? void (0) : __assert_fail ("_type == ast_filter || _type == ast_predicate"
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 9656, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
9657
9658 if (_test == predicate_constant || _test == predicate_constant_one)
9659 apply_predicate_number_const(ns, first, _right, stack);
9660 else if (_right->rettype() == xpath_type_number)
9661 apply_predicate_number(ns, first, _right, stack, once);
9662 else
9663 apply_predicate_boolean(ns, first, _right, stack, once);
9664 }
9665
9666 void apply_predicates(xpath_node_set_raw& ns, size_t first, const xpath_stack& stack, nodeset_eval_t eval)
9667 {
9668 if (ns.size() == first) return;
9669
9670 bool last_once = eval_once(ns.type(), eval);
9671
9672 for (xpath_ast_node* pred = _right; pred; pred = pred->_next)
9673 pred->apply_predicate(ns, first, stack, !pred->_next && last_once);
9674 }
9675
9676 bool step_push(xpath_node_set_raw& ns, xml_attribute_struct* a, xml_node_struct* parent, xpath_allocator* alloc)
9677 {
9678 assert(a)(static_cast <bool> (a) ? void (0) : __assert_fail ("a"
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 9678, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
9679
9680 const char_t* name = a->name ? a->name + 0 : PUGIXML_TEXT("")"";
9681
9682 switch (_test)
9683 {
9684 case nodetest_name:
9685 if (strequal(name, _data.nodetest) && is_xpath_attribute(name))
9686 {
9687 ns.push_back(xpath_node(xml_attribute(a), xml_node(parent)), alloc);
9688 return true;
9689 }
9690 break;
9691
9692 case nodetest_type_node:
9693 case nodetest_all:
9694 if (is_xpath_attribute(name))
9695 {
9696 ns.push_back(xpath_node(xml_attribute(a), xml_node(parent)), alloc);
9697 return true;
9698 }
9699 break;
9700
9701 case nodetest_all_in_namespace:
9702 if (starts_with(name, _data.nodetest) && is_xpath_attribute(name))
9703 {
9704 ns.push_back(xpath_node(xml_attribute(a), xml_node(parent)), alloc);
9705 return true;
9706 }
9707 break;
9708
9709 default:
9710 ;
9711 }
9712
9713 return false;
9714 }
9715
9716 bool step_push(xpath_node_set_raw& ns, xml_node_struct* n, xpath_allocator* alloc)
9717 {
9718 assert(n)(static_cast <bool> (n) ? void (0) : __assert_fail ("n"
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 9718, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
9719
9720 xml_node_type type = PUGI__NODETYPE(n);
9721
9722 switch (_test)
9723 {
9724 case nodetest_name:
9725 if (type == node_element && n->name && strequal(n->name, _data.nodetest))
9726 {
9727 ns.push_back(xml_node(n), alloc);
9728 return true;
9729 }
9730 break;
9731
9732 case nodetest_type_node:
9733 ns.push_back(xml_node(n), alloc);
9734 return true;
9735
9736 case nodetest_type_comment:
9737 if (type == node_comment)
9738 {
9739 ns.push_back(xml_node(n), alloc);
9740 return true;
9741 }
9742 break;
9743
9744 case nodetest_type_text:
9745 if (type == node_pcdata || type == node_cdata)
9746 {
9747 ns.push_back(xml_node(n), alloc);
9748 return true;
9749 }
9750 break;
9751
9752 case nodetest_type_pi:
9753 if (type == node_pi)
9754 {
9755 ns.push_back(xml_node(n), alloc);
9756 return true;
9757 }
9758 break;
9759
9760 case nodetest_pi:
9761 if (type == node_pi && n->name && strequal(n->name, _data.nodetest))
9762 {
9763 ns.push_back(xml_node(n), alloc);
9764 return true;
9765 }
9766 break;
9767
9768 case nodetest_all:
9769 if (type == node_element)
9770 {
9771 ns.push_back(xml_node(n), alloc);
9772 return true;
9773 }
9774 break;
9775
9776 case nodetest_all_in_namespace:
9777 if (type == node_element && n->name && starts_with(n->name, _data.nodetest))
9778 {
9779 ns.push_back(xml_node(n), alloc);
9780 return true;
9781 }
9782 break;
9783
9784 default:
9785 assert(false && "Unknown axis")(static_cast <bool> (false && "Unknown axis") ?
void (0) : __assert_fail ("false && \"Unknown axis\""
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 9785, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__)); // unreachable
9786 }
9787
9788 return false;
9789 }
9790
9791 template <class T> void step_fill(xpath_node_set_raw& ns, xml_node_struct* n, xpath_allocator* alloc, bool once, T)
9792 {
9793 const axis_t axis = T::axis;
9794
9795 switch (axis)
9796 {
9797 case axis_attribute:
9798 {
9799 for (xml_attribute_struct* a = n->first_attribute; a; a = a->next_attribute)
9800 if (step_push(ns, a, n, alloc) & once)
9801 return;
9802
9803 break;
9804 }
9805
9806 case axis_child:
9807 {
9808 for (xml_node_struct* c = n->first_child; c; c = c->next_sibling)
9809 if (step_push(ns, c, alloc) & once)
9810 return;
9811
9812 break;
9813 }
9814
9815 case axis_descendant:
9816 case axis_descendant_or_self:
9817 {
9818 if (axis == axis_descendant_or_self)
9819 if (step_push(ns, n, alloc) & once)
9820 return;
9821
9822 xml_node_struct* cur = n->first_child;
9823
9824 while (cur)
9825 {
9826 if (step_push(ns, cur, alloc) & once)
9827 return;
9828
9829 if (cur->first_child)
9830 cur = cur->first_child;
9831 else
9832 {
9833 while (!cur->next_sibling)
9834 {
9835 cur = cur->parent;
9836
9837 if (cur == n) return;
9838 }
9839
9840 cur = cur->next_sibling;
9841 }
9842 }
9843
9844 break;
9845 }
9846
9847 case axis_following_sibling:
9848 {
9849 for (xml_node_struct* c = n->next_sibling; c; c = c->next_sibling)
9850 if (step_push(ns, c, alloc) & once)
9851 return;
9852
9853 break;
9854 }
9855
9856 case axis_preceding_sibling:
9857 {
9858 for (xml_node_struct* c = n->prev_sibling_c; c->next_sibling; c = c->prev_sibling_c)
9859 if (step_push(ns, c, alloc) & once)
9860 return;
9861
9862 break;
9863 }
9864
9865 case axis_following:
9866 {
9867 xml_node_struct* cur = n;
9868
9869 // exit from this node so that we don't include descendants
9870 while (!cur->next_sibling)
9871 {
9872 cur = cur->parent;
9873
9874 if (!cur) return;
9875 }
9876
9877 cur = cur->next_sibling;
9878
9879 while (cur)
9880 {
9881 if (step_push(ns, cur, alloc) & once)
9882 return;
9883
9884 if (cur->first_child)
9885 cur = cur->first_child;
9886 else
9887 {
9888 while (!cur->next_sibling)
9889 {
9890 cur = cur->parent;
9891
9892 if (!cur) return;
9893 }
9894
9895 cur = cur->next_sibling;
9896 }
9897 }
9898
9899 break;
9900 }
9901
9902 case axis_preceding:
9903 {
9904 xml_node_struct* cur = n;
9905
9906 // exit from this node so that we don't include descendants
9907 while (!cur->prev_sibling_c->next_sibling)
9908 {
9909 cur = cur->parent;
9910
9911 if (!cur) return;
9912 }
9913
9914 cur = cur->prev_sibling_c;
9915
9916 while (cur)
9917 {
9918 if (cur->first_child)
9919 cur = cur->first_child->prev_sibling_c;
9920 else
9921 {
9922 // leaf node, can't be ancestor
9923 if (step_push(ns, cur, alloc) & once)
9924 return;
9925
9926 while (!cur->prev_sibling_c->next_sibling)
9927 {
9928 cur = cur->parent;
9929
9930 if (!cur) return;
9931
9932 if (!node_is_ancestor(cur, n))
9933 if (step_push(ns, cur, alloc) & once)
9934 return;
9935 }
9936
9937 cur = cur->prev_sibling_c;
9938 }
9939 }
9940
9941 break;
9942 }
9943
9944 case axis_ancestor:
9945 case axis_ancestor_or_self:
9946 {
9947 if (axis == axis_ancestor_or_self)
9948 if (step_push(ns, n, alloc) & once)
9949 return;
9950
9951 xml_node_struct* cur = n->parent;
9952
9953 while (cur)
9954 {
9955 if (step_push(ns, cur, alloc) & once)
9956 return;
9957
9958 cur = cur->parent;
9959 }
9960
9961 break;
9962 }
9963
9964 case axis_self:
9965 {
9966 step_push(ns, n, alloc);
9967
9968 break;
9969 }
9970
9971 case axis_parent:
9972 {
9973 if (n->parent)
9974 step_push(ns, n->parent, alloc);
9975
9976 break;
9977 }
9978
9979 default:
9980 assert(false && "Unimplemented axis")(static_cast <bool> (false && "Unimplemented axis"
) ? void (0) : __assert_fail ("false && \"Unimplemented axis\""
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 9980, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__)); // unreachable
9981 }
9982 }
9983
9984 template <class T> void step_fill(xpath_node_set_raw& ns, xml_attribute_struct* a, xml_node_struct* p, xpath_allocator* alloc, bool once, T v)
9985 {
9986 const axis_t axis = T::axis;
9987
9988 switch (axis)
9989 {
9990 case axis_ancestor:
9991 case axis_ancestor_or_self:
9992 {
9993 if (axis == axis_ancestor_or_self && _test == nodetest_type_node) // reject attributes based on principal node type test
9994 if (step_push(ns, a, p, alloc) & once)
9995 return;
9996
9997 xml_node_struct* cur = p;
9998
9999 while (cur)
10000 {
10001 if (step_push(ns, cur, alloc) & once)
10002 return;
10003
10004 cur = cur->parent;
10005 }
10006
10007 break;
10008 }
10009
10010 case axis_descendant_or_self:
10011 case axis_self:
10012 {
10013 if (_test == nodetest_type_node) // reject attributes based on principal node type test
10014 step_push(ns, a, p, alloc);
10015
10016 break;
10017 }
10018
10019 case axis_following:
10020 {
10021 xml_node_struct* cur = p;
10022
10023 while (cur)
10024 {
10025 if (cur->first_child)
10026 cur = cur->first_child;
10027 else
10028 {
10029 while (!cur->next_sibling)
10030 {
10031 cur = cur->parent;
10032
10033 if (!cur) return;
10034 }
10035
10036 cur = cur->next_sibling;
10037 }
10038
10039 if (step_push(ns, cur, alloc) & once)
10040 return;
10041 }
10042
10043 break;
10044 }
10045
10046 case axis_parent:
10047 {
10048 step_push(ns, p, alloc);
10049
10050 break;
10051 }
10052
10053 case axis_preceding:
10054 {
10055 // preceding:: axis does not include attribute nodes and attribute ancestors (they are the same as parent's ancestors), so we can reuse node preceding
10056 step_fill(ns, p, alloc, once, v);
10057 break;
10058 }
10059
10060 default:
10061 assert(false && "Unimplemented axis")(static_cast <bool> (false && "Unimplemented axis"
) ? void (0) : __assert_fail ("false && \"Unimplemented axis\""
, "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 10061, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__)); // unreachable
10062 }
10063 }
10064
10065 template <class T> void step_fill(xpath_node_set_raw& ns, const xpath_node& xn, xpath_allocator* alloc, bool once, T v)
10066 {
10067 const axis_t axis = T::axis;
10068 const bool axis_has_attributes = (axis == axis_ancestor || axis == axis_ancestor_or_self || axis == axis_descendant_or_self || axis == axis_following || axis == axis_parent || axis == axis_preceding || axis == axis_self);
10069
10070 if (xn.node())
10071 step_fill(ns, xn.node().internal_object(), alloc, once, v);
10072 else if (axis_has_attributes && xn.attribute() && xn.parent())
10073 step_fill(ns, xn.attribute().internal_object(), xn.parent().internal_object(), alloc, once, v);
10074 }
10075
10076 template <class T> xpath_node_set_raw step_do(const xpath_context& c, const xpath_stack& stack, nodeset_eval_t eval, T v)
10077 {
10078 const axis_t axis = T::axis;
10079 const bool axis_reverse = (axis == axis_ancestor || axis == axis_ancestor_or_self || axis == axis_preceding || axis == axis_preceding_sibling);
10080 const xpath_node_set::type_t axis_type = axis_reverse ? xpath_node_set::type_sorted_reverse : xpath_node_set::type_sorted;
10081
10082 bool once =
10083 (axis == axis_attribute && _test == nodetest_name) ||
10084 (!_right && eval_once(axis_type, eval)) ||
10085 (_right && !_right->_next && _right->_test == predicate_constant_one);
10086
10087 xpath_node_set_raw ns;
10088 ns.set_type(axis_type);
10089
10090 if (_left)
10091 {
10092 xpath_node_set_raw s = _left->eval_node_set(c, stack, nodeset_eval_all);
10093
10094 // self axis preserves the original order
10095 if (axis == axis_self) ns.set_type(s.type());
10096
10097 for (const xpath_node* it = s.begin(); it != s.end(); ++it)
10098 {
10099 size_t size = ns.size();
10100
10101 // in general, all axes generate elements in a particular order, but there is no order guarantee if axis is applied to two nodes
10102 if (axis != axis_self && size != 0) ns.set_type(xpath_node_set::type_unsorted);
10103
10104 step_fill(ns, *it, stack.result, once, v);
10105 if (_right) apply_predicates(ns, size, stack, eval);
10106 }
10107 }
10108 else
10109 {
10110 step_fill(ns, c.n, stack.result, once, v);
10111 if (_right) apply_predicates(ns, 0, stack, eval);
10112 }
10113
10114 // child, attribute and self axes always generate unique set of nodes
10115 // for other axis, if the set stayed sorted, it stayed unique because the traversal algorithms do not visit the same node twice
10116 if (axis != axis_child && axis != axis_attribute && axis != axis_self && ns.type() == xpath_node_set::type_unsorted)
10117 ns.remove_duplicates();
10118
10119 return ns;
10120 }
10121
10122 public:
10123 xpath_ast_node(ast_type_t type, xpath_value_type rettype_, const char_t* value):
10124 _type(static_cast<char>(type)), _rettype(static_cast<char>(rettype_)), _axis(0), _test(0), _left(0), _right(0), _next(0)
10125 {
10126 assert(type == ast_string_constant)(static_cast <bool> (type == ast_string_constant) ? void
(0) : __assert_fail ("type == ast_string_constant", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 10126, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
10127 _data.string = value;
10128 }
10129
10130 xpath_ast_node(ast_type_t type, xpath_value_type rettype_, double value):
10131 _type(static_cast<char>(type)), _rettype(static_cast<char>(rettype_)), _axis(0), _test(0), _left(0), _right(0), _next(0)
10132 {
10133 assert(type == ast_number_constant)(static_cast <bool> (type == ast_number_constant) ? void
(0) : __assert_fail ("type == ast_number_constant", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 10133, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
10134 _data.number = value;
10135 }
10136
10137 xpath_ast_node(ast_type_t type, xpath_value_type rettype_, xpath_variable* value):
10138 _type(static_cast<char>(type)), _rettype(static_cast<char>(rettype_)), _axis(0), _test(0), _left(0), _right(0), _next(0)
10139 {
10140 assert(type == ast_variable)(static_cast <bool> (type == ast_variable) ? void (0) :
__assert_fail ("type == ast_variable", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 10140, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
10141 _data.variable = value;
10142 }
10143
