12218 {
12219 return (_type == xpath_type_node_set) ? static_cast<const impl::xpath_variable_node_set*>(this)->value : impl::dummy_node_set;
12220 }
12221
12222 PUGI__FN bool xpath_variable::set(bool value)
12223 {
12224 if (_type != xpath_type_boolean) return false;
12225
12226 static_cast<impl::xpath_variable_boolean*>(this)->value = value;
12227 return true;
12228 }
12229
12230 PUGI__FN bool xpath_variable::set(double value)
12231 {
12232 if (_type != xpath_type_number) return false;
12233
12234 static_cast<impl::xpath_variable_number*>(this)->value = value;
12235 return true;
12236 }
12237
12238 PUGI__FN bool xpath_variable::set(const char_t* value)
12239 {
12240 if (_type != xpath_type_string) return false;
12241
12242 impl::xpath_variable_string* var = static_cast<impl::xpath_variable_string*>(this);
12243
12244 // duplicate string
12245 size_t size = (impl::strlength(value) + 1) * sizeof(char_t);
12246
12247 char_t* copy = static_cast<char_t*>(impl::xml_memory::allocate(size));
12248 if (!copy) return false;
12249
12250 memcpy(copy, value, size);
12251
12252 // replace old string
12253 if (var->value) impl::xml_memory::deallocate(var->value);
12254 var->value = copy;
12255
12256 return true;
12257 }
12258
12259 PUGI__FN bool xpath_variable::set(const xpath_node_set& value)
12260 {
12261 if (_type != xpath_type_node_set) return false;
12262
12263 static_cast<impl::xpath_variable_node_set*>(this)->value = value;
12264 return true;
12265 }
12266
12267 PUGI__FN xpath_variable_set::xpath_variable_set()
12268 {
12269 for (size_t i = 0; i < sizeof(_data) / sizeof(_data[0]); ++i)
12270 _data[i] = 0;
12271 }
12272
12273 PUGI__FN xpath_variable_set::~xpath_variable_set()
12274 {
12275 for (size_t i = 0; i < sizeof(_data) / sizeof(_data[0]); ++i)
12276 _destroy(_data[i]);
12277 }
12278
12279 PUGI__FN xpath_variable_set::xpath_variable_set(const xpath_variable_set& rhs)
12280 {
12281 for (size_t i = 0; i < sizeof(_data) / sizeof(_data[0]); ++i)
12282 _data[i] = 0;
12283
12284 _assign(rhs);
12285 }
12286
12287 PUGI__FN xpath_variable_set& xpath_variable_set::operator=(const xpath_variable_set& rhs)
12288 {
12289 if (this == &rhs) return *this;
12290
12291 _assign(rhs);
12292
12293 return *this;
12294 }
12295
12296#ifdef PUGIXML_HAS_MOVE
12297 PUGI__FN xpath_variable_set::xpath_variable_set(xpath_variable_set&& rhs) PUGIXML_NOEXCEPTnoexcept
12298 {
12299 for (size_t i = 0; i < sizeof(_data) / sizeof(_data[0]); ++i)
12300 {
12301 _data[i] = rhs._data[i];
12302 rhs._data[i] = 0;
12303 }
12304 }
12305
12306 PUGI__FN xpath_variable_set& xpath_variable_set::operator=(xpath_variable_set&& rhs) PUGIXML_NOEXCEPTnoexcept
12307 {
12308 for (size_t i = 0; i < sizeof(_data) / sizeof(_data[0]); ++i)
12309 {
12310 _destroy(_data[i]);
12311
12312 _data[i] = rhs._data[i];
12313 rhs._data[i] = 0;
12314 }
12315
12316 return *this;
12317 }
12318#endif
12319
12320 PUGI__FN void xpath_variable_set::_assign(const xpath_variable_set& rhs)
12321 {
12322 xpath_variable_set temp;
12323
12324 for (size_t i = 0; i < sizeof(_data) / sizeof(_data[0]); ++i)
12325 if (rhs._data[i] && !_clone(rhs._data[i], &temp._data[i]))
12326 return;
12327
12328 _swap(temp);
12329 }
12330
12331 PUGI__FN void xpath_variable_set::_swap(xpath_variable_set& rhs)
12332 {
12333 for (size_t i = 0; i < sizeof(_data) / sizeof(_data[0]); ++i)
12334 {
12335 xpath_variable* chain = _data[i];
12336
12337 _data[i] = rhs._data[i];
12338 rhs._data[i] = chain;
12339 }
12340 }
12341
12342 PUGI__FN xpath_variable* xpath_variable_set::_find(const char_t* name) const
12343 {
12344 const size_t hash_size = sizeof(_data) / sizeof(_data[0]);
12345 size_t hash = impl::hash_string(name) % hash_size;
12346
12347 // look for existing variable
12348 for (xpath_variable* var = _data[hash]; var; var = var->_next)
12349 if (impl::strequal(var->name(), name))
12350 return var;
12351
12352 return 0;
12353 }
12354
12355 PUGI__FN bool xpath_variable_set::_clone(xpath_variable* var, xpath_variable** out_result)
12356 {
12357 xpath_variable* last = 0;
12358
12359 while (var)
12360 {
12361 // allocate storage for new variable
12362 xpath_variable* nvar = impl::new_xpath_variable(var->_type, var->name());
12363 if (!nvar) return false;
12364
12365 // link the variable to the result immediately to handle failures gracefully
12366 if (last)
12367 last->_next = nvar;
12368 else
12369 *out_result = nvar;
12370
12371 last = nvar;
12372
12373 // copy the value; this can fail due to out-of-memory conditions
12374 if (!impl::copy_xpath_variable(nvar, var)) return false;
12375
12376 var = var->_next;
12377 }
12378
12379 return true;
12380 }
12381
12382 PUGI__FN void xpath_variable_set::_destroy(xpath_variable* var)
12383 {
12384 while (var)
12385 {
12386 xpath_variable* next = var->_next;
12387
12388 impl::delete_xpath_variable(var->_type, var);
12389
12390 var = next;
12391 }
12392 }
12393
12394 PUGI__FN xpath_variable* xpath_variable_set::add(const char_t* name, xpath_value_type type)
12395 {
12396 const size_t hash_size = sizeof(_data) / sizeof(_data[0]);
12397 size_t hash = impl::hash_string(name) % hash_size;
12398
12399 // look for existing variable
12400 for (xpath_variable* var = _data[hash]; var; var = var->_next)
12401 if (impl::strequal(var->name(), name))
12402 return var->type() == type ? var : 0;
12403
12404 // add new variable
12405 xpath_variable* result = impl::new_xpath_variable(type, name);
12406
12407 if (result)
12408 {
12409 result->_next = _data[hash];
12410
12411 _data[hash] = result;
12412 }
12413
12414 return result;
12415 }
12416
12417 PUGI__FN bool xpath_variable_set::set(const char_t* name, bool value)
12418 {
12419 xpath_variable* var = add(name, xpath_type_boolean);
12420 return var ? var->set(value) : false;
12421 }
12422
12423 PUGI__FN bool xpath_variable_set::set(const char_t* name, double value)
12424 {
12425 xpath_variable* var = add(name, xpath_type_number);
12426 return var ? var->set(value) : false;
12427 }
12428
12429 PUGI__FN bool xpath_variable_set::set(const char_t* name, const char_t* value)
12430 {
12431 xpath_variable* var = add(name, xpath_type_string);
12432 return var ? var->set(value) : false;
12433 }
12434
12435 PUGI__FN bool xpath_variable_set::set(const char_t* name, const xpath_node_set& value)
12436 {
12437 xpath_variable* var = add(name, xpath_type_node_set);
12438 return var ? var->set(value) : false;
12439 }
12440
12441 PUGI__FN xpath_variable* xpath_variable_set::get(const char_t* name)
12442 {
12443 return _find(name);
12444 }
12445
12446 PUGI__FN const xpath_variable* xpath_variable_set::get(const char_t* name) const
12447 {
12448 return _find(name);
12449 }
12450
12451 PUGI__FN xpath_query::xpath_query(const char_t* query, xpath_variable_set* variables): _impl(0)
12452 {
12453 impl::xpath_query_impl* qimpl = impl::xpath_query_impl::create();
12454
12455 if (!qimpl)
2
←
Taking false branch
→
12456 {
12457 #ifdef PUGIXML_NO_EXCEPTIONS
12458 _result.error = "Out of memory";
12459 #else
12460 throw std::bad_alloc();
12461 #endif
12462 }
12463 else
12464 {
12465 using impl::auto_deleter; // MSVC7 workaround
12466 auto_deleter<impl::xpath_query_impl> impl(qimpl, impl::xpath_query_impl::destroy);
12467
12468 qimpl->root = impl::xpath_parser::parse(query, variables, &qimpl->alloc, &_result);
3
←
Calling 'xpath_parser::parse'
→
13
←
Returning from 'xpath_parser::parse'
→
12469
12470 if (qimpl->root)
14
←
Taking true branch
→
12471 {
12472 qimpl->root->optimize(&qimpl->alloc);
15
←
Calling 'xpath_ast_node::optimize'
→
12473
12474 _impl = impl.release();
12475 _result.error = 0;
12476 }
12477 else
12478 {
12479 #ifdef PUGIXML_NO_EXCEPTIONS
12480 if (qimpl->oom) _result.error = "Out of memory";
12481 #else
12482 if (qimpl->oom) throw std::bad_alloc();
12483 throw xpath_exception(_result);
12484 #endif
12485 }
12486 }
12487 }
12488
12489 PUGI__FN xpath_query::xpath_query(): _impl(0)
12490 {
12491 }
12492
12493 PUGI__FN xpath_query::~xpath_query()
12494 {
12495 if (_impl)
12496 impl::xpath_query_impl::destroy(static_cast<impl::xpath_query_impl*>(_impl));
12497 }
12498
12499#ifdef PUGIXML_HAS_MOVE
12500 PUGI__FN xpath_query::xpath_query(xpath_query&& rhs) PUGIXML_NOEXCEPTnoexcept
12501 {
12502 _impl = rhs._impl;
12503 _result = rhs._result;
12504 rhs._impl = 0;
12505 rhs._result = xpath_parse_result();
12506 }
12507
12508 PUGI__FN xpath_query& xpath_query::operator=(xpath_query&& rhs) PUGIXML_NOEXCEPTnoexcept
12509 {
12510 if (this == &rhs) return *this;
12511
12512 if (_impl)
12513 impl::xpath_query_impl::destroy(static_cast<impl::xpath_query_impl*>(_impl));
12514
12515 _impl = rhs._impl;
12516 _result = rhs._result;
12517 rhs._impl = 0;
12518 rhs._result = xpath_parse_result();
12519
12520 return *this;
12521 }
12522#endif
12523
12524 PUGI__FN xpath_value_type xpath_query::return_type() const
12525 {
12526 if (!_impl) return xpath_type_none;
12527
12528 return static_cast<impl::xpath_query_impl*>(_impl)->root->rettype();
12529 }
12530
12531 PUGI__FN bool xpath_query::evaluate_boolean(const xpath_node& n) const
12532 {
12533 if (!_impl) return false;
12534
12535 impl::xpath_context c(n, 1, 1);
12536 impl::xpath_stack_data sd;
12537
12538 bool r = static_cast<impl::xpath_query_impl*>(_impl)->root->eval_boolean(c, sd.stack);
12539
12540 if (sd.oom)
12541 {
12542 #ifdef PUGIXML_NO_EXCEPTIONS
12543 return false;
12544 #else
12545 throw std::bad_alloc();
12546 #endif
12547 }
12548
12549 return r;
12550 }
12551
12552 PUGI__FN double xpath_query::evaluate_number(const xpath_node& n) const
12553 {
12554 if (!_impl) return impl::gen_nan();
12555
12556 impl::xpath_context c(n, 1, 1);
12557 impl::xpath_stack_data sd;
12558
12559 double r = static_cast<impl::xpath_query_impl*>(_impl)->root->eval_number(c, sd.stack);
12560
12561 if (sd.oom)
12562 {
12563 #ifdef PUGIXML_NO_EXCEPTIONS
12564 return impl::gen_nan();
12565 #else
12566 throw std::bad_alloc();
12567 #endif
12568 }
12569
12570 return r;
12571 }
12572
12573#ifndef PUGIXML_NO_STL
12574 PUGI__FN string_t xpath_query::evaluate_string(const xpath_node& n) const
12575 {
12576 if (!_impl) return string_t();
12577
12578 impl::xpath_context c(n, 1, 1);
12579 impl::xpath_stack_data sd;
12580
12581 impl::xpath_string r = static_cast<impl::xpath_query_impl*>(_impl)->root->eval_string(c, sd.stack);
12582
12583 if (sd.oom)
12584 {
12585 #ifdef PUGIXML_NO_EXCEPTIONS
12586 return string_t();
12587 #else
12588 throw std::bad_alloc();
12589 #endif
12590 }
12591
12592 return string_t(r.c_str(), r.length());
12593 }
12594#endif
12595
12596 PUGI__FN size_t xpath_query::evaluate_string(char_t* buffer, size_t capacity, const xpath_node& n) const
12597 {
12598 impl::xpath_context c(n, 1, 1);
12599 impl::xpath_stack_data sd;
12600
12601 impl::xpath_string r = _impl ? static_cast<impl::xpath_query_impl*>(_impl)->root->eval_string(c, sd.stack) : impl::xpath_string();
12602
12603 if (sd.oom)
12604 {
12605 #ifdef PUGIXML_NO_EXCEPTIONS
12606 r = impl::xpath_string();
12607 #else
12608 throw std::bad_alloc();
12609 #endif
12610 }
12611
12612 size_t full_size = r.length() + 1;
12613
12614 if (capacity > 0)
12615 {
12616 size_t size = (full_size < capacity) ? full_size : capacity;
12617 assert(size > 0)(static_cast <bool> (size > 0) ? void (0) : __assert_fail
("size > 0", "/home/chuck/Code/adios2/source/master/thirdparty/pugixml/pugixml/src/pugixml.cpp"
, 12617, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
12618
12619 memcpy(buffer, r.c_str(), (size - 1) * sizeof(char_t));
12620 buffer[size - 1] = 0;
12621 }
12622
12623 return full_size;
12624 }
12625
12626 PUGI__FN xpath_node_set xpath_query::evaluate_node_set(const xpath_node& n) const
12627 {
12628 impl::xpath_ast_node* root = impl::evaluate_node_set_prepare(static_cast<impl::xpath_query_impl*>(_impl));
12629 if (!root) return xpath_node_set();
12630
12631 impl::xpath_context c(n, 1, 1);
12632 impl::xpath_stack_data sd;
12633
12634 impl::xpath_node_set_raw r = root->eval_node_set(c, sd.stack, impl::nodeset_eval_all);
12635
12636 if (sd.oom)
12637 {
12638 #ifdef PUGIXML_NO_EXCEPTIONS
12639 return xpath_node_set();
12640 #else
12641 throw std::bad_alloc();
12642 #endif
12643 }
12644
12645 return xpath_node_set(r.begin(), r.end(), r.type());
12646 }
12647
12648 PUGI__FN xpath_node xpath_query::evaluate_node(const xpath_node& n) const
12649 {
12650 impl::xpath_ast_node* root = impl::evaluate_node_set_prepare(static_cast<impl::xpath_query_impl*>(_impl));
12651 if (!root) return xpath_node();
12652
12653 impl::xpath_context c(n, 1, 1);
12654 impl::xpath_stack_data sd;
12655
12656 impl::xpath_node_set_raw r = root->eval_node_set(c, sd.stack, impl::nodeset_eval_first);
12657
12658 if (sd.oom)
12659 {
12660 #ifdef PUGIXML_NO_EXCEPTIONS
12661 return xpath_node();
12662 #else
12663 throw std::bad_alloc();
12664 #endif
12665 }
12666
12667 return r.first();
12668 }
12669
12670 PUGI__FN const xpath_parse_result& xpath_query::result() const
12671 {
12672 return _result;
12673 }
12674
12675 PUGI__FN static void unspecified_bool_xpath_query(xpath_query***)
12676 {
12677 }
12678
12679 PUGI__FN xpath_query::operator xpath_query::unspecified_bool_type() const
12680 {
12681 return _impl ? unspecified_bool_xpath_query : 0;
12682 }
12683
12684 PUGI__FN bool xpath_query::operator!() const
12685 {
12686 return !_impl;
12687 }
12688
12689 PUGI__FN xpath_node xml_node::select_node(const char_t* query, xpath_variable_set* variables) const
12690 {
12691 xpath_query q(query, variables);
12692 return q.evaluate_node(*this);
12693 }
12694
12695 PUGI__FN xpath_node xml_node::select_node(const xpath_query& query) const
12696 {
12697 return query.evaluate_node(*this);
12698 }
12699
12700 PUGI__FN xpath_node_set xml_node::select_nodes(const char_t* query, xpath_variable_set* variables) const
12701 {
12702 xpath_query q(query, variables);
12703 return q.evaluate_node_set(*this);
12704 }
12705
12706 PUGI__FN xpath_node_set xml_node::select_nodes(const xpath_query& query) const
12707 {
12708 return query.evaluate_node_set(*this);
12709 }
12710
12711 PUGI__FN xpath_node xml_node::select_single_node(const char_t* query, xpath_variable_set* variables) const
12712 {
12713 xpath_query q(query, variables);
1
Calling constructor for 'xpath_query'
→
12714 return q.evaluate_node(*this);
12715 }
12716
12717 PUGI__FN xpath_node xml_node::select_single_node(const xpath_query& query) const
12718 {
12719 return query.evaluate_node(*this);
12720 }
12721}
12722
12723#endif
12724
12725#ifdef __BORLANDC__
12726# pragma option pop
12727#endif
12728
12729// Intel C++ does not properly keep warning state for function templates,
12730// so popping warning state at the end of translation unit leads to warnings in the middle.
12731#if defined(_MSC_VER) && !defined(__INTEL_COMPILER)
12732# pragma warning(pop)
12733#endif
12734
12735#if defined(_MSC_VER) && defined(__c2__)
12736# pragma clang diagnostic pop
12737#endif
12738
12739// Undefine all local macros (makes sure we're not leaking macros in header-only mode)
12740#undef PUGI__NO_INLINE
12741#undef PUGI__UNLIKELY
12742#undef PUGI__STATIC_ASSERT
12743#undef PUGI__DMC_VOLATILE
12744#undef PUGI__UNSIGNED_OVERFLOW
12745#undef PUGI__MSVC_CRT_VERSION
12746#undef PUGI__SNPRINTF
12747#undef PUGI__NS_BEGIN
12748#undef PUGI__NS_END
12749#undef PUGI__FN
12750#undef PUGI__FN_NO_INLINE
12751#undef PUGI__GETHEADER_IMPL
12752#undef PUGI__GETPAGE_IMPL
12753#undef PUGI__GETPAGE
12754#undef PUGI__NODETYPE
12755#undef PUGI__IS_CHARTYPE_IMPL
12756#undef PUGI__IS_CHARTYPE
12757#undef PUGI__IS_CHARTYPEX
12758#undef PUGI__ENDSWITH
12759#undef PUGI__SKIPWS
12760#undef PUGI__OPTSET
12761#undef PUGI__PUSHNODE
12762#undef PUGI__POPNODE
12763#undef PUGI__SCANFOR
12764#undef PUGI__SCANWHILE
12765#undef PUGI__SCANWHILE_UNROLL
12766#undef PUGI__ENDSEG
12767#undef PUGI__THROW_ERROR
12768#undef PUGI__CHECK_ERROR
12769
12770#endif
